요약: A temperature sensor according to the present invention includes a sensor body for sensing a temperature; a sheath pin core wire electrically connected to the sensor body; a connector electrically connecting between the sheath pin core wire and the lead wire; and a protection tube for containing the connector and the sheath pin core wire, and for protecting the connector and the sheath pin core wire. A connection portion between the sheath pin core wire and the lead wire is hardened by a ceramic material so that a molded portion is provided. A displacement limiting means is provided for limiting displacement of the molded portion exceeding a predetermined value in the protection tube. The present invention can sufficiently reduce the tension acting on a sheath pin core wire. Further, the present invention can provide an exhaust temperature sensor having a sufficiently low tension acting on the sheath pin core wire which can be effectively used in an internal combustion engine.
대표청구항: 1. A temperature sensor comprising: a sensor body for sensing a temperature; a sheath pin core wire electrically connected to the sensor body; a connector electrically connecting between the sheath pin core wire and a lead wire; and a protection tube for containing the connector and the sheath pin core wire, and for protecting the connector and the sheath pin core wire; wherein a connection portion between the sheath pin core wire and the lead wire, including the connector, is hardened by a ceramic material so that a molded portion is provided; and wherein a displacement limiting means is provided for limiting a displacement of the molded portion, exceeding a predetermined value, in the protection tube.
발명자/고안자: Tomohiro Adachi | Atsushi Kurano
비 특허 참고문헌(B1): Patent Abstracts of Japan, vol. 001, No. 092 (E-038), Aug. 25, 1997 & JP 52 027681 A (Hitachi Ltd).

요약: A temperature sensor which features improved response characteristics and in which a thermistor element is contained in a metal enclosure in a state where a pair of electrode wires for taking out signals are connected in an exposed manner at two opposing end surfaces thereof. The temperature sensor comprises a metal enclosure 2 , a thermistor element 3 contained in the metal enclosure, and a pair of electrode wires 4 connected to the two opposing end surfaces of the thermistor element in a form being exposed over the thermistor element in the metal enclosure to take out thermistor signals, wherein a distance H between the thermistor element and the metal enclosure is not smaller than 0 but is not larger than 0.3 mm.
대표청구항: 1. A temperature sensor comprising: a metal enclosure; a thermistor element contained in said metal enclosure; and a pair of electrode wires connected to two opposing end surfaces of said thermistor element in a form being exposed over said thermistor element in said metal enclosure to take out thermistor signals; wherein a distance between said thermistor element and said metal enclosure is not smaller than 0 but is not larger than 0.3 mm; said metal enclosure being of a cylindrical shape, said thermistor element is contained in said metal enclosure on the side of one end thereof, and a protion of said metal enclosure where said thermistor element is contained, is a small-diameter portion which is so draw-formed as to possess a diameter smaller than that of other portions of said metal enclosure; and a sheath pin in contained in said metal enclosure on the other side thereof, said sheath pin having core wires electrically connected to said pair of electrode wires and having a diameter larger than that of said thermistor element, and a portion of said metal enclosure between the portion containing said sheath pin and said small diameter portion is so draw-formed as to possess a diameter larger than that of said small-diameter portion but smaller than that of the portion containing the sheath pin, the outer diameter of the sheath pin being from 1.6 mm to 3.2 mm, and the diameter of the circumscribed circle of the thermistor element is from 0.35 mm to 0.8 mm.
발명자/고안자: Shigeru Murata | Atsushi Kurano
비 특허 참고문헌(B1): Patent Abstracts of Japan, vol. 009, No. 120 (P-358), May 24, 1985 & JP 60 004832 A (Murata Seisakusho:KK), Jan. 11, 1996.

요약: A temperature sensor, in particular for a gas sensor, has at least one printed conductor, where a temperature-dependent change in a resistance of the printed conductor is detected and analyzed. The printed conductor has at least one section made of a solid electrolyte.
대표청구항: 1. A temperature sensor for a gas sensor, comprising: at least one printed conductor having at least one section made of a solid electrolyte; andmeans for detecting and analyzing a temperature-dependent change in a resistance of the at least one printed conductor.

발명의 명칭: Temperature sensor and method of manufacturing the same
요약: A low cost high-performance temperature sensor that can be manufactured of a thin-film temperature detecting element with high yield. The temperature sensor has a metal cylinder (10); a ceramic substrate (2) placed in the metal cylinder and a temperature detecting element (3) and film electrodes (94) connected with the output of the temperature detecting element (3); an inorganic filer (95) for absorbing stress to hold the ceramic substrate (2) inside the metal cylinder (1); and a cap (6), provided on one end of the metal cylinder (1), for protecting the temperature detecting element (30) on the ceramic substrate (2). One end of the ceramic substrate is fixed to a first end of a terminal (27) which is U-shaped, and the terminal includes an expansion and contraction absorbing portion (20) between a first and second end.
대표청구항: 1. A temperature sensor comprising: a metal cylinder;a ceramic substrate inserted into said metal cylinder;a temperature detecting element in a form of a film disposed near a first end of said ceramic substrate;an electrode in a form of a film electrically coupled to said temperature detecting element and;a terminal,wherein a first end of said terminal is electrically connected to an end of said electrode,a second end of said ceramic substrate is fixed to said first end of said terminal and said terminal includes an expansion and contraction absorbing portion disposed between a second end and said first end of said terminal, said first end of said terminal being in a U-shape and said first end of said ceramic substrate being disposed in and fixed to said metal cylinder.
발명자/고안자: Shoji; Rihito | Tamai; Takashi | Matsubara; Katsunori | Saitou; Kiyoshi

요약: In a temperature sensor inserted into a hole formed in a wall of an exhaust gas passage thereby to set a temperature sensitive element in position in the passage, a metal rib in close contact with a hole for preventing the leakage of the exhaust gas is welded over the entire outer peripheral surface of a metal outer cylinder at the end thereof nearer to the passage, and a cylindrical metal sleeve for covering lead wire connecting portions is welded over the entire periphery of a protrusion of the rib at a position further away from the passage than the coupling portion between the rib and the outer cylinder.
대표청구항: 1. A temperature sensor in combination with a wall portion and an attachment device attaching the temperature sensor to the wall, the temperature sensor comprising: a wiring member for holding conductive core wires in a metal outer cylinder through an insulating material;a temperature sensitive element connected to an end of the core wires at an end of said wiring member;lead wires connected at a connecting portion to the other end of said core wires at the other end of said wiring member;a metal seal member directly welded to an outer peripheral surface of said metal outer cylinder, said seal member being constructed and arranged to engage and be kept in close contact with a surface of a hole formed in the wall portion when said sensor is inserted therein and attached to the wall portion with the attachment device, for preventing the leakage of an object fluid from said hole, the wall portion defining a passage in which the object fluid is to flow; anda cylindrical protective member for covering a connecting portions between said core wires arid said lead wires;wherein said protective member is coupled to said seal member at a portion of said seal member farther away from said temperature sensitive element than a weld between said seal member and said outer cylinder.
발명자/고안자: Takahashi; Sotoo | Fukaya; Matsuo

발명의 명칭: Temperature sensor element and temperature sensor including the same
요약: The present invention provides a temperature sensor element having excellent heat resistance, quick heat response, stable resistance, and high reliability with a less variation in resistance against time. The temperature sensor element includes a thermo-sensitive film mainly composed of a heat sensitive material having electrical resistance varies depending on the temperature; a pair of electrode films arranged to measure the electrical resistance in the direction of the thickness of the thermo-sensitive film, a base plate mainly composed of a heat-resistant insulating material for supporting the thermo-sensitive film and the electrode films, an anti-diffusion film interposed between the thermo-sensitive film and the electrode film in the vicinity of the base plate, and a film mainly composed of a heat-resistant insulating material for covering the thermo-sensitive film and the electrode films except the lead-connecting terminals of the electrode films. The thermo-sensitive film is composed of an oxide of corundum crystalline structure represented by the formula of (Al1-x-yCrxFey)2O3,where 0.05≤x+y≤0.95, and 0≤y/(x+y)≤0.6, and the anti-diffusion film is composed of an oxide of corundum crystalline structure represented by the formula of (Al1-x-yCrxFey)2O3,where 0≤x+y≤0.95.
대표청구항: 1. A temperature sensor element comprising: a thermo-sensitive film comprising a heat sensitive material having an electrical resistance which varies depending on the temperature;a pair of electrode films, each having a lead-connecting terminal and an end portion opposing said lead-connecting terminal, said end portions of said pair of electrode films arranged on opposite faces of said thermo-sensitive film to provide for measurement of the electrical resistance in a direction transverse to the plane of the thermo-sensitive filma base plate comprising a heat-resistant insulating material which supports said thermo-sensitive film and said pair of electrode films;a film comprising a heat-resistant insulating material which covers said thermo-sensitive film and said pair of electrode films except for the lead-connecting terminal of each of said pair of electrode films; andan anti-diffusion film between said thermo-sensitive film and one of said pair of electrode films which is nearer to said base plate, wherein said anti-diffusion film is formed and heat-treated to form a corundum crystal prior to formation of said thermo-sensitive film such that said anti-diffusion film prevents diffusion of said one of said pair of electrode films into said thermo-sensitive film.
발명자/고안자: Tomozawa; Atsushi | Fujii; Eiji | Torii; Hideo | Takayama; Ryoichi
대리인: Akin, Gump, Strauss, Hauer & Feld, L.L.P.

발명의 명칭: Temperature sensor element, temperature sensor having the same and method for producing the same temperature sensor element
요약: A temperature sensor element for measuring the temperature of exhaust gas from car engines comprises a metallic support having a shape of a flat board, a first electric-insulating film existing on the support, a first temperature sensitive film existing on the first electric-insulating film and having a pair of electrodes, and a second electric-insulating film existing on the temperature sensitive film. The element is superior in thermal shock resistance. The element needs no heat-resistant cap. The element is superior in heat-response since the element has a small heat capacity.
대표청구항: 1. A temperature sensor element comprising a metallic support having a shape of a flat board, wherein the metallic support comprises a heat-resistant alloy consisting essentially of 18 atom % of Cr, 3 to 4 atom % of Al and the remainder of Fe, and has a thickness of 0.2 to 10 mm,a first electric-insulating Al2O3film of 1 to 3 μm thickness provided on the support,a first temperature sensitive oxide thin film including Al, Cr, and Fe with corundum crystal structure or spinel crystal structure provided on the first electric-insulating film and having a pair of electrodes of 0.05 to 3 μm thickness containing Pt, anda second electric-insulating Al2O3film provided on the temperature sensitive film.
발명자/고안자: Torii; Hideo | Kamada; Takeshi | Tomozawa; Atsushi | Fujii; Eiji | Takayama; Ryoichi | Moriwake; Hiroki
발명자/고안자 국적: JP | JP | JP | JP | JP | JP
대리인: Merchant, Gould, Smith, Edell, Welter & Schmidt P.A.

발명의 명칭: Thermistor having temperature detecting sections of substantially the same composition and dimensions for detecting subtantially identical temperature ranges
요약: A thermistor type temperature sensor having a substrate made from an electrically insulating ceramic plate. A thin or thick film detecting resistor is printed on the substratum. A thick or thin film pull-up resistor may also be printed on the substratum, and trimming of the resistors is possible. The ratio of B-constant values for the detecting resistor and the pull-up resistor may be selected so that it is locate between 0.4 to 0.9 or 1.1 to 1.5. The detecting resistor may be constructed from thermistor sections of the same composition and the sections may be connected in parallel or in series. The thermistor sensor can be connected to the pipe through which a gas passes. When the sensor is connected to the pipe, the angle of the measuring plane may be adjusted, so that a precise measurement can be obtained.
대표청구항: 1. A thermistor type temperature sensor, comprising: a substrate plate made of an electrically insulating ceramic material;a thin or thick layer of a thermistor material constructing a first resistor, the resistance value of which varies in accordance with the temperature to be detected;a thin or thick layer of a trimmable second resistor for allowing a change in the resistance value of said first resistor to be detected;said first and second resistors being integrally formed on said substrate; andtrimmable resistor means connected to said first and second resistors for canceling an offset of the detected resistance value, said trimmable resistor means comprising a third resistor which is in series with said first resistor and a fourth resistor which is in parallel with said first resistor.
발명자/고안자: Kuzuoka; Kaoru | Takahashi; Sotoo | Shibata; Masamichi | Shibayama; Susumu
대리인: Cushman Darby & Cushman IP Group of Pillsbury Madison & Sutro LLP

발명의 명칭: PTC temperature sensor for use in an exhaust gas system
요약: A PTC temperature sensor, in particular for use in the exhaust gas system of internal combustion engines, has a sensing element including a PTC resistor connected to conductor webs disposed in a housing. The PTC resistor and the conductor webs are composed of a homogeneous material to form a PTC resistor track. The temperature sensing element is formed from a laminated composite of ceramic films in which the PTC resistor track is hermetically encapsulated with respect to the gas being measured and the ambient air.
대표청구항: 1. PTC temperature sensor, in particular for use in the exhaust gas system of internal combustion engines, comprising a sensing element including a PTC resistor connected to conductor webs disposed in a housing, the PTC resistor and the conductor webs being composed of a homogeneous material to form a PTC resistor track, the temperature sensing element being formed from laminated composite of ceramic films in which the PTC resistor track is hermetically encapsulated with respect to the gas being measured and the ambient air, the laminated composite of the temperature sensing element being formed from two solid electrolyte ceramic films including a base film having the PTC resistor track printed on by thick-film technology and a second film which is laminated together with and sintered together with the base film, the solid electrolyte ceramic films being composed of films of ZrO2stabilized with yttrium, and insulating layers being provided between the PTC resistor track and at the solid electrolyte films respectively.
발명자/고안자: Friese; Karl-Hermann | Wiedenmann; Hans-Martin

발명의 명칭: Process for producing PTC temperature sensor elements for PTC temperature sensor
요약: A PTC temperature sensor and a process for producing PTC temperature sensing elements from ceramic films for a PTC temperature sensor are proposed. The PTC temperature sensing elements are so designed that the PTC resistor track is hermetically encapsulated with respect to the gas being measured and the ambient air. Ceramic films based on an insulator ceramic, in particular based on Al2O3,and ceramic films based on a solid electrolyte can be used to produce the temperature sensing elements. The PTC temperature sensor according to the invention is distinguished, in particular, by the fact that, while the manufacturing procedure is cheap, it is not subject to aging due to the effect of varying O2partial pressures, has a high resistance to aging of the resistance characteristic in rich and lean gas mixtures, for example in motor vehicle exhaust gases, at 300°-1000° C. and has a construction free from extraneous potential, is characterized by short response times owning to its low heat capacity and is suitable for incorportion in very narrow housing as a consequence of small dimensions.
대표청구항: 1. A process for producing a PTC temperature sensing element for a PTC temperature sensor, comprising the steps of providing a first ceramic film based on an insulator ceramic; punching interconnection holes in the first ceramic film; printing contact areas in the region of the interconnection holes; printing the other side of the film with a PTC resistor track; and laminating the film and sintering the film with a second film based on an insulator ceramic in a manner such that the PTC resistor track is hermetically encapsulated with respect to a gas being measured and ambient air.
발명자/고안자: Friese; Karl-Hermann | Wiedenmann; Hans-Martin | Stecher; Gunther

발명의 명칭: NTC temperature sensor and process for producing NTC temperature sensing elements
요약: The NTC temperature sensor includes a NTC temperature sensing element having an NTC resistor and made of a laminated composite of ceramic films, which is so designed that the ambient air or oxygen supplied by electrolytic pumping has free access, via a channel in the laminated composite, to the NTC resistor. The NTC resistor is hermetically sealed from a gas being measured. Solid electrolyte films which conduct O-2ions, and films based on Al2O3can be used to make the laminated composite. The NTC resistor characteristic curve is independent of the composition of the gas being measured. The laminated composite can be formed of at least three solid electrolyte ceramic films including a base film provided with punched-out interconnection holes and conductor tracks printed by thick film technology, an intermediate film having a punched-out channel and a channel enlargement around the ends of the conductor tracks forming the electrodes of the NTC resistor, and a covering film.
대표청구항: 1. NTC temperature sensor, in particular for measuring gas temperature of a gas in an exhaust gas system of an internal combustion engine, comprising a sensing element arranged in a housing, the sensing element including an NTC resistor and conductor tracks which connect electrically to the NTC resistor, the sensing element being formed from a laminated composite of a plurality of ceramic films, the laminated composite having a channel (8) for permitting free access of a member selected from the group consisting of ambient air and oxygen supplied electrolytically by pumping to the NTC resistor (14, 17), and means for hermetically sealing the NTC resistor with respect to the gas whose gas temperature is being measured.
발명자/고안자: Friese; Karl-Hermann | Stecher; Gunther | Wiedenmann; Hans-Martin

요약: A sensor (101) is configured such that a seal member (71) is provided in a deformed manner through crimping of a portion of a tube (11) located toward a rear end (17c) of the tube (11). The seal member (71) is deformed such that a frontward-oriented surface (75), which is a bottom surface of a recess (74) formed in a front end (73) of the seal member (72), presses a rear end (45) of an insulation sheath (41) frontward. Consequently, a front end (21a) of a sensor element is pressed against a front end (12) of the tube (11) via the insulation sheath (41). By virtue of a pressing action induced by rubber-like elasticity, high sensor responsiveness is maintained over a long period of time.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: a metal tube (11) having a closed front end (12); a temperature sensor element (21) disposed in a front end portion of the tube;an insulation sheath (41) disposed rearward of the temperature sensor element within the tube (11) and core wires (25) connected to respective electrodes of the temperature sensor element, (23) the core wires (23) extending through the insulation sheath (41); lead wires (51) connected to respective rear ends of the core wires (25), the core wires extending outward from a rear end of the insulation sheath (45), and the lead wires (51) extending outward from a rear end of the tube (19); andan elastic seal member (171, 271, 371, 471) having rubber-like elasticity, the lead wires (51) extending through the seal member (171, 271, 371, 471), at least a portion of the seal member (171, 271, 371, 471) being disposed within the tube (11) and rearward of the rear end of the insulation sheath (45) for maintaining a seal at a rear end portion of the tube (19);the seal member (171, 271, 371, 471) being deformed through crimping of the tube (11);the temperature sensor being characterized in that, through deformation of the seal member (171, 271, 371, 471), the seal member (171, presses the rear end of the insulation sheath (45) frontward, directly or via another member, by means of a frontward-oriented surface of the seal member (75), whereby the temperature sensor element (21) is pressed against a front end of the tube (12) via the insulation sheath (41).

발명의 명칭: Conductive sintered oxide, thermistor element including the same, and temperature sensor including the same
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Oxyde fritt? conducteur, ?l?ment thermistor l'incluant et capteur de temp?rature l'incluant
요약: A conductive sintered oxide including: a first crystal phase represented by REl4Al2O9 and a second crystal phase having a perovskite structure represented by (RE21-cSLc)(AlxM1y)O3. RE1 is a first element group consisting of Yb and/or Lu and at least one element selected from Group IIIA elements excluding Yb, Lu and La. RE2 is a second element group consisting of at least one element selected from Group IIIA elements excluding La and including at least one of the elements constituting the first element group RE1. SL is an element group consisting of at least one of Sr, Ca and Mg and which includes Sr as a main element, and M1 is an element group consisting of at least one element selected from Groups IVA, VA, VIA, VIIA and VIII excluding Cr. The coefficient c is in the range of 0.18<c<0.50, and the coefficients x and y are in the range of 0.95≤x+y≤1.1.
대표청구항: A conductive sintered oxide which comprises: a first crystal phase having a composition represented by RE14Al2O9 anda second crystal phase having a perovskite structure represented by (RE21-cSLc)(AlxM1y)O3, in whichRE1 is a first element group consisting of Yb and/or Lu and at least one element selected from Group IIIA elements excluding Yb, Lu and La,RE2 is a second element group consisting of at least one element selected from Group IIIA elements excluding La and including at least one of the elements constituting the first element group RE1,SL is an element group consisting of at least one of Sr, Ca and Mg and which includes Sr as a main element thereof in terms of molar proportion, andM1 is an element group consisting of at least one element selected from Groups IVA, VA, VIA, VIIA and VIII excluding Cr,the coefficient c of the second crystal phase is in the range of 0.18<c<0.50, andthe coefficients x and y of the second crystal phase are in the range of 0.95≤x+y≤1.1.
대표청구항(제2언어): Oxyde fritt? conducteur qui comprend : une premi?re phase cristalline ayant une composition repr?sent?e par RE14Al2O9 etune seconde phase cristalline ayant une structure de p?rovskite repr?sent?e par (RE21-cSLc) (AlxM1y)O3, dans lequelRE1 est un premier groupe d'?l?ment se composant de Yb et/ou de Lu et au moins d'un ?l?ment choisi parmi les ?l?ments du groupe IIIA excluant Yb, Lu et La,RE2 est un second groupe d'?l?ment se composant d'au moins un ?l?ment choisi parmi les ?l?ments du groupe IIIA excluant La et incluant au moins l'un des ?l?ments constituant le premier groupe d'?l?ment RE1,SL est un groupe d'?l?ment se composant d'au moins un ?l?ment parmi Sr, Ca et Mg et qui comprend Sr comme ?l?ment principal de celui-ci en termes de proportion molaire, etM1 est un groupe d'?l?ments se composant d'au moins un ?l?ment choisi parmi les groupes IVA, VA, VIA, VIIA et VIII excluant Cr,le coefficient c de la seconde phase cristalline est compris dans la plage de 0,18<c<0,50, etles coefficients x et y de la seconde phase cristalline sont compris dans la plage de 0,95≤x+y≤1,1.

발명의 명칭: ELECTRICALLY CONDUCTIVE OXIDE SINTERED COMPACT, THERMISTOR ELEMENT EMPLOYING THE SAME, AND TEMPERATURE SENSOR EMPLOYING THE SAME
발명의 명칭(제2언어): CORPS FRITT? D'OXYDE CONDUCTEUR, ?L?MENT DE THERMISTANCE UTILISANT CELUI-CI ET CAPTEUR DE TEMP?RATURE UTILISANT CELUI-CI.
요약: A sintered electroconductive oxide (1) forming a thermistor element (2) has a first crystal phase having a composition represented by RE14Al2O9 and a second crystal phase having a perovskite structure represented by (RE21-aSLa)MO3, and that the factor a of the second crystal phase satisfies the following condition: 0.18<a<0.50, wherein RE1 represents a first element group consisting of at least one of Yb and Lu and at least one species selected from among group 3A elements excluding Yb, Lu, and La; RE2 represents a second element group which contains at least one species selected from among group 3A elements excluding La and which contains at least one species selected from the first element group RE1; M represents an element group consisting of Al and at least one species selected from group 4A to 7A, and 8 elements; and SL represents an element group consisting of Sr, Ca, and Mg, with at least Sr being included at a predominant proportion by mole.
요약(제2언어): Le corps fritt? d'oxyde conducteur (1) qui compose l'?l?ment de thermistance (2) est tel que qu'il comprend une premi?re phase cristalline dont la composition chimique s'exprime par la formule RE14Al2O9 ainsi qu'une seconde phase cristalline de structure p?rovskite s'exprimant par la formule (RE21-aSLa) MO3, dont le coefficient a se situe dans la fourchette : 0,18 < a < 0,50. Dans ces formules RE1 d?signe un premier groupe d'?l?ments form? au moins soit d'Yb, soit de Lu, et d'une sorte d'?l?ments choisis dans la famille des ?l?ments 3A ? l'exclusion du Yb, du Lu et du La; RE2 d?signe un second groupe d'?l?ments form? d'au moins un ?l?ment de la famille 3A ? l'exclusion du La, et comportant au moins une sorte d'?l?ment formant le premier groupe RE1; M d?signe un groupe d'?l?ments form? d'au moins une sorte d'?l?ment choisi dans les familles 4A ? 7A et 8, et d'un ?l?ment de la famille A1; SL d?signe un groupe d'?l?ments comprenant au moins selon le crit?re du rapport molaire le Sr comme ?l?ment principal parmi le groupe Sr, Ca, et Mg.
대표청구항: A sintered electroconductive oxide (1) characterized in that the oxide has a first crystal phase having a composition represented by RE14Al2O9 and a second crystal phase having a perovskite structure represented by (RE21-aSLa)MO3, and that the factor a of the second crystal phase satisfies the following condition: 0.18<a<0.50, wherein RE1 represents a first element group consisting of at least one of Yb and Lu and at least one species selected from among group 3A elements (group 3 elements) excluding Yb, Lu, and La; RE2 represents a second element group which contains at least one species selected from among group 3A elements excluding La and which contains at least one species selected from the first element group RE1; M1 represents an element group consisting of at least one species selected from group 4A, 5A, 6A, 7A, and 8 elements (group 4 to group 10 elements); and M represents an element group consisting of the element group M1 and Al; and SL represents an element group consisting of Sr, Ca, and Mg, with at least Sr being included at a predominant proportion by mole.

(1) caract?ris? en ce que l'oxyde pr?sente une premi?re phase de cristal ayant une composition repr?sent?e par RE14Al2O9 et une seconde phase de cristal pr?sentant une structure de p?rovskite repr?sent?e par (RE21-aSLa)MO3, et en ce que le facteur a de la seconde phase de cristal satisfait la condition suivante : 0,18<a<0,50, o? RE1 repr?sente un premier groupe d'?l?ment constitu? d'au moins un de Yb et Lu et d'au moins une esp?ce choisie parmi des ?l?ments du groupe 3A (?l?ments du groupe 3) excluant Yb, Lu et La ; RE2 repr?sente un second groupe d'?l?ment qui contient au moins une esp?ce choisie parmi des ?l?ments du groupe 3A excluant La et qui contient au moins une esp?ce choisie dans le premier groupe d'?l?ment RE1 ; M1 repr?sente un groupe d'?l?ment constitu? d'au moins une esp?ce choisie parmi des ?l?ments du groupe 4A, 5A, 6A, 7A, et 8 (?l?ments du groupe 4 au groupe 10) ; et M repr?sente un groupe d'?l?ment constitu? du groupe d'?l?ment M1 et d'Al ; et SL repr?sente un groupe d'?l?ment constitu? de Sr, Ca, et Mg, avec au moins Sr ?tant inclus ? une proportion pr?dominante en mole.

발명의 명칭: A sensor arrangement for measuring a pressure and a temperature in a fluid
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Agencement de capteurs pour mesurer une pression et une temp?rature dans un fluide
요약: A sensor arrangement (1) for measuring a pressure and a temperature in a fluid is disclosed. The sensor arrangement (1) comprises a temperature sensitive electrical element (3) and a pressure sensing electrical element (6), the temperature sensitive electrical element (3) and pressure sensing electrical element (6) are both coupled to one side of a metallic membrane structure (4,16). The metallic membrane structure is arranged to pass on the temperature of the fluid which is at the other side of the membrane structure (4,16) to the temperature sensitive electrical element (3) and to pass on the pressure in the fluid to the pressure sensing electrical element (6). The membrane structure comprises an elongated body (16). At a closed end (15) of the elongated body is located the temperature sensitive electrical element (3). The pressure sensitive structure (4) is located at the opposite end (17) of the elongated body. The opposite end is open. The pressure sensitive structure (4) is circular and comprises a hole (7) in the centre. The opposite end (17) of the elongated body is hermetically connected to the pressure sensitive structure, forming thereby an axisymetric membrane structure such that the part for measuring the temperature (16) transmits the pressure to the pressure sensing membrane (4) on which it is mounted. Both sensitive elements are protected. In this way a combined pressure and temperature sensor is obtained which is applicable in vehicle air-conditioning systems working with CO2 as refrigerant.
대표청구항: A sensor arrangement (1) for measuring a pressure and a temperature in a fluid, the sensor arrangement (1) comprising a common body (11, 12, 14), a membrane structure (4, 16), a temperature sensitive electrical element (3) and a pressure sensing electrical element (6), the temperature sensitive electrical element (3) and pressure sensing electrical element (6) are both coupled to one side of the membrane structure (4, 16), wherein the membrane structure (4, 16) comprises an elongated body (16), at a closed end (15) of the elongated body is located the temperature sensitive electrical element (3) and a first part (14) of the common body (11, 12, 14) surrounds lengthwise at least partially the elongated body (16) of the membrane structure (4, 16),characterized in that the sensor arrangement further comprises a sealing member (5), the sealing member (5) being present between the first part (14) of the common body (11, 12, 14) and the elongated body (16), and in that the pressure sensing electrical element (6) is located at an open end of the elongated body (16).
대표청구항(제2언어): Agencement de capteurs (1) pour mesurer une pression et une temp?rature dans un fluide, l'agencement de capteurs (1) comprenant un corps commun (11, 12, 14), une structure de membrane (4, 16), un ?l?ment ?lectrique sensible ? la temp?rature (3) et un ?l?ment ?lectrique sensible ? la pression (6), l'?l?ment ?lectrique sensible ? la temp?rature (3) et l'?l?ment ?lectrique sensible ? la pression (6) sont tous deux coupl?s ? un c?t? de la structure de membrane (4, 16), dans lequel : la structure de membrane (4, 16) comprend un corps allong? (16), au niveau d'une extr?mit? ferm?e (15) du corps allong?, est positionn? l'?l?ment ?lectrique sensible ? la temp?rature (3) et une premi?re partie (14) du corps commun (11, 12, 14) entoure, dans le sens de la largeur, au moins partiellement le corps allong? (16) de la structure de membrane (4, 16),caract?ris? en ce que l'agencement de capteurs comprend en outre un ?l?ment d'?tanch?it? (5), l'?l?ment d'?tanch?it? (5) ?tant pr?sent entre la premi?re partie (14) du corps commun (11, 12, 14) et le corps allong? (16), et en ce que l'?l?ment ?lectrique de d?tection de pression (6) est positionn? au niveau d'une extr?mit? ouverte du corps allong? (16).

요약: A temperature sensor includes a temperature-sensing element (103) having a temperature-sensing portion (103) and an element electrode wire (104) connected to the temperature-sensing portion (103) and extending rearward from the temperature-sensing portion (103); a sheath member (106) having a sheath core wire (108) joined to the element electrode wire (104), and a sheath tube (107) internally and insulatively holding the sheath core wire (108); an enclosing member (112) made of metal, assuming the form of a closed-bottomed tube having a bottom portion at a front end, and enclosing at least the temperature-sensing element (102) and a joint portion (110) between the element electrode wire (104) and the sheath core wire (108); and a holding member (114) charged into a portion of a space enclosed by the enclosing member (112), the portion extending between the bottom portion and a front end face of the temperature-sensing portion (103). The element electrode wire (104) has a bend (104a) at its intermediate portion (103) between the temperature-sensing portion and the joint portion (110).
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: a temperature-sensing element (102) having a temperature-sensing portion (103) and an element electrode wire (104; 204; 304, 305) connected to the temperature-sensing portion (103) and extending rearward from the temperature-sensing portion (103);a sheath member (106) having a sheath core wire (108, 109; 208) joined to the element electrode wire (104; 204; 304, 305), and a sheath tube (107) filled with a sheath filler so as to internally and insulatively hold the sheath core wire (108, 109; 208);an enclosing member (112) made of metal, assuming the form of a closed-bottomed tube having a bottom portion at a front end, and enclosing at least the temperature-sensing element (102) and a joint portion (110) between the element electrode wire (104; 204; 304, 305) and the sheath core wire (108, 109; 208) formed by laser-spot-welding of overlying projecting end portions of the element electrode wire to those of the corresponding sheath core wires extending from the front end of the sheath tube (107); anda holding member (114) charged into at least a portion of a space enclosed by the enclosing member (112), the portion extending between a front end face of the temperature-sensing portion (103) and the bottom portion of the enclosing member (112);wherein the element electrode wire (104; 204; 304, 305) has a bend (104a; 204a; 304a, 305a) at an intermediate portion of the element electrode wire between the temperature-sensing portion (103) and the joint portion (110),characterized in that the holding member (114) holds the temperature-sensing element (102) and the joint portion (110).
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature comprenant : un ?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature (102) ayant une partie de d?tection de temp?rature (103) et un fil d'?lectrode d'?l?ment (104 ; 204 ; 304, 305) reli? ? la partie de d?tection de temp?rature (103) et s'?tendant vers l'arri?re ? partir de la partie de d?tection de temp?rature (103) ;un organe de gaine (106) ayant un fil de coeur de gaine (108, 109 ; 208) assembl? au fil d'?lectrode d'?l?ment (104 ; 204 ; 304, 305), et un tube de gaine (107) rempli d'une charge de gaine de mani?re ? maintenir int?rieurement et de mani?re isolante le fil de coeur de gaine (108, 109 ; 208) ;un organe enfermant (112) en m?tal, prenant la forme d'un tube ? fond ferm? ayant une partie de fond ? une extr?mit? avant, et enfermant au moins l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature (102) et une partie de jonction (110) entre le fil d'?lectrode d'?l?ment (104 ; 204 ; 304, 305) et le fil de coeur de gaine (108, 109 ; 208) form? par un soudage par points au laser de parties d'extr?mit? saillantes en recouvrement du fil d'?lectrode d'?l?ment ? ceux des fils de coeur de gaine correspondants s'?tendant depuis l'extr?mit? avant du tube de gaine (107) ; etun organe de maintien (114) charg? dans au moins une partie d'un espace ferm? par l'organe enfermant (112), la partie s'?tendant entre une face d'extr?mit? avant de la partie de d?tection de temp?rature (103) et la partie de fond de l'organe enfermant (112) ;dans lequel le fil d'?lectrode d'?l?ment (104 ; 204 ; 304, 305) a un coude (104a ; 204a ; 304a, 305a) sur une partie interm?diaire du fil d'?lectrode d'?l?ment entre la partie de d?tection de temp?rature (103) et la partie de jonction (110),caract?ris? en ce que l'organe de maintien (114) maintient l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature (102) et la partie de jonction (110).

요약: An object of the present invention is to attain greater improvement of response characteristic in a temperature sensor having a thermistor element held in a metal tube. The invention provides a temperature sensor (1) including a cylindrical metal tube (3) having a front end side blocked, a thermistor element (2), and a sheath member (8) connected to the thermistor element (2) and held in the inside of the metal tube (3), wherein: the metal tube (3) has a small-diameter portion (33) located on the front end side and entirely having an inner diameter smaller than the outer diameter of the sheath member (8) , and a large-diameter portion (36) located on the rear end side of the small-diameter portion (33) and having a diameter larger than the outer diameter of the small-diameter portion (33) ; and a thermistor sintered body (21) is held in the small-diameter portion (33) and cement (10) is filled in between a front end of the thermistor sintered body (21) and a front end of an inner wall of the metal tube (3) and on the front end side viewed from a read end surface of the thermistor sintered body (21).
요약(제2언어): L'invention concerne un capteur de temp?rature (1) comprenant un ?l?ment de gaine (8) connect? ? un ?l?ment de thermistor (2) stock? dans un tube m?tallique (3) tubulaire ferm? au niveau de son c?t? pointe et permettant d'accro?tre la sensibilit? dudit capteur de temp?rature. Le tube m?tallique (3) comprend une partie ? petit diam?tre (33) positionn?e au niveau du c?t? pointe dudit tube et un diam?tre int?rieur inf?rieur au diam?tre ext?rieur de l'?l?ment de gaine (18) sur la totalit? de sa longueur; et une partie ? grand diam?tre (33) positionn?e au niveau du c?t? d'extr?mit? arri?re de la partie ? petit diam?tre (33) et pr?sentant un diam?tre sup?rieur ? celui du diam?tre ext?rieur de la partie ? petit diam?tre (33). Un corps de thermistor (21) fritt? est stock? dans la partie ? petit diam?tre (33) et un ciment (10) est d?pos? sur le c?t? d'extr?mit? de pointe de la face d'extr?mit? arri?re du corps de thermistor (21) fritt? entre la pointe dudit corps de thermistor (21) fritt? et l'extr?mit? de pointe de paroi int?rieure du tube m?tallique (3).
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: a cylindrical metal tube (3) extending in an axial direction and having a front end side blocked;a thermal sensing element (2) held in an inside of said metal tube (3) and including a thermal sensing portion (21) with electrical characteristic varying according to a temperature, and a pair of electrode wires (22) provided in said thermal sensing portion (21) and extending toward a rear end side of said metal tube (3);an electrically insulating member (10), wherein a heat conductivity of said electrically insulating member (10) is not lower than 1.2 W/m·K; anda sheath member (8) held in an inside of said metal tube (3) and including: a sheath pipe (9), a pair of metal cores (7) held in the sheath pipe and connected to said pair of electrode wires (22) of said thermal sensing element (2) while electrically insulated, and electrically insulating powder filled in between the sheath pipe (9) and each of the metal cores (7), wherein: said metal tube (3) has a small-diameter portion (33) located on a front end side and entirely having an inner diameter smaller than an outer diameter of said sheath member (8), and a large-diameter portion (32, 34, 36) located on a rear end side of said small-diameter portion (33) and having a diameter larger than an outer diameter of said small-diameter portion (33);an outer diameter of said small-diameter portion (33) is not larger than 3.5 mm;a shortest distance L between said thermal sensing portion (21) and an inner wall surface of the small-diameter portion (33) satisfies 0 ≤ L ≤ 0.3 mm; andsaid thermal sensing portion (21) is held in said small-diameter portion (33),characterizedin that a longest distance H between a front end of said thermal sensing portion (21) and a front end of an inner wall of said metal tube (3) is not larger than 2.0 mm, and in that the electrically insulating member (10) is filled at least in between a front end of said thermal sensing portion (21) and a front end of an inner wall of said metal tube (3), so that the front end of the thermal sensing portion (21) and the front end of the inner wall of the metal tube (3) are in contact with each other through the electrically insulating member (10).

d'extr?mit? arri?re dudit tube m?tallique (3) ;un ?l?ment ?lectriquement isolant (10), une conductivit? thermique dudit ?l?ment ?lectriquement isolant (10) n'?tant pas inf?rieure ? 1,2 W/m K ; etun ?l?ment de gaine (8) contenu dans une partie int?rieure dudit tube m?tallique (3) et comprenant : un tuyau de gainage (9), une paire de noyaux m?talliques (7) contenus dans le tuyau de gainage et reli?s ? ladite paire de fils d'?lectrode (22) dudit ?l?ments de d?tection thermique (2) tout en ?tant ?lectriquement isol?s, et une poudre d'isolation ?lectrique remplissant l'espace entre le tuyau de gainage (9) et chacun des noyaux m?talliques (7), dans lequel : ledit tube m?tallique (3) pr?sente une partie ? petit diam?tre (33) situ?e sur un c?t? d'extr?mit? avant et pr?sentant en int?gralit? un diam?tre interne plus petit qu'un diam?tre externe dudit ?l?ment de gaine (8) et une partie ? grand diam?tre (32, 34, 36) situ?e sur un c?t? d'extr?mit? arri?re de ladite partie ? petit diam?tre (33) et pr?sentant un diam?tre plus grand qu'un diam?tre externe de ladite partie ? petit diam?tre (33) ;un diam?tre externe de ladite partie ? petit diam?tre (33) n'est pas plus grand que 3,5 mm ;une distance plus courte L entre ladite partie de d?tection thermique (21) et une surface de paroi interne de la partie ? petit diam?tre (33) v?rifie 0 ≤ L ≤ 0,3 mm ; etladite partie de d?tection thermique (21) est contenue dans ladite partie ? petit diam?tre (33),caract?ris? en ce qu'une distance plus longue H entre une extr?mit? avant de ladite partie de d?tection thermique (21) et une extr?mit? avant d'une paroi interne dudit tube m?tallique (3) n'est pas plus grande que 2,0 mm et en ce que l'?l?ment ?lectriquement isolant (10) remplit un espace entre au moins une extr?mit? avant de ladite partie de d?tection thermique (21) et une extr?mit? avant d'une paroi interne dudit tube m?tallique (3), de mani?re ? ce que l'extr?mit? avant de la partie de d?tection thermique (21) et l'extr?mit? avant de la paroi interne du tube m?tallique (3) soient en contact l'une avec l'autre par le biais de l'?l?ment ?lectriquement isolant (10).

발명의 명칭: EXHAUST GAS TEMPERATURE SENSOR INCLUDING A VIBRATION REDUCING AND/OR MODIFYING SLEEVE
발명의 명칭(제2언어): CAPTEUR DE TEMP?RATURE DE GAZ D'?CHAPPEMENT COMPRENANT UN MANCHON DE R?DUCTION ET/OU DE MODIFICATION DES VIBRATIONS
요약: A temperature sensor system includes a temperature sensor, a cable having an end coupled to the temperature sensor, and a stop flange coupled to the cable. The temperature sensor system further includes a vibration reducing and/or modifying sleeve positioned against the stop flange. The sleeve includes a body portion defining a through passage configured to receive and retain at least a portion of the cable. The sleeve is configured to provide stability and reduce vibrational stress to the temperature sensor system. The sleeve is configured to be added to the temperature sensor system during assembly of the system and/or to be added after the temperature sensor system is fully assembled.
요약(제2언어): L'invention concerne un syst?me de capteur de temp?rature comprenant un capteur de temp?rature, un c?ble dont une extr?mit? est coupl?e au capteur de temp?rature, et une bride d'arr?t coupl?e au c?ble. Le syst?me de capteur de temp?rature comprend ?galement un manchon de r?duction et/ou de modification des vibrations positionn? contre la bride d'arr?t. Le manchon comprend une partie corps d?finissant un passage traversant con?u pour recevoir et retenir au moins une partie du c?ble. Le manchon est con?u pour assurer la stabilit? et pour r?duire les contraintes de vibration s'exer?ant sur le syst?me de capteur de temp?rature. Le manchon est ?galement con?u pour ?tre ajout? au syst?me de capteur de temp?rature pendant l'assemblage de ce dernier et/ou apr?s que le syst?me de capteur de temp?rature est compl?tement assembl?.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor system (400) comprising: a temperature sensor (106; 402);a cable (404) having an end coupled to said temperature sensor (106; 402);a stop flange (414) coupled to said cable (404); anda vibration reducing and/or modifying sleeve (416) positioned against said stop flange (414), said sleeve (416) comprising a body portion (518) having a first open end (520) and an opposing second open end (522) defining a through passage (524) configured to receive and retain at least a portion of said cable (404),characterized in that said body portion (518) further comprises a plurality of transition portions (532) extending from said second open end (522) of said body portion (518), each transition portion (532) being separated from an adjacent transition portion (532) by a gap and including a flange portion (534).

발명의 명칭: TEMPERATURE SENSOR AND METHOD FOR THE PRODUCTION OF A TEMPERATURE SENSOR
발명의 명칭(제2언어): CAPTEUR DE TEMP?RATURE ET PROC?D? DE PRODUCTION ASSOCI?
요약: Disclosed is a temperature sensor (100). The sensor comprises a mineral-insulated supply line (108), a bottomed metal tube (102) and a temperature sensing element secured in a support structure. An open end part (102B) of the bottomed metal tube is connected mechanically to the mineral-insulated supply line. A wire connection mechanically and electrically couples the temperature sensing element to the mineral-insulated supply line. The support structure is permanently moveable in axial direction of the bottomed metal tube in a bottom end part (102A) of the bottomed metal tube.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor (100) comprising: - a mineral-insulated supply line (108);- a bottomed metal tube (102) with a bottom end part (102A) and an open end part (102B), the open end part is connected mechanically to the mineral-insulated supply line; and,- a temperature sensing element (104) contained in said bottomed metal tube, a wire connection mechanically and electrically couples the temperature sensing element to the mineral-insulated supply line,characterized in that, the temperature sensing element is secured in a support structure (106) wherein the support structure is permanently moveable in axial direction of the bottomed metal tube in the bottom end part (102A).

요약: An apparatus for temperature sensing is disclosed that includes a sensor tube and a cable assembly connected to and extending from said sensor tube wherein said cable assembly communicates electrically with the sensor tube for temperature sensing operations thereof. An O-ring component can be selected based on an inner diameter of said sensor tube and an outer diameter of said cable assembly, wherein said o-ring component is crimped in order to seal and protect said sensor tube from de-alignment and misplacement and located co-axial to said sensor tube and said cable assembly, thereby providing an enhanced mechanical strength and prevention against leakage or ingress of moisture from or to said sensor tube.
요약(제2언어): La pr?sente invention concerne un appareil pour la d?tection de temp?rature qui comprend un tube de d?tecteur et un ensemble de c?bles connect? ? et s'?tendant hors dudit tube de d?tecteur, l'ensemble de c?bles communiquant ?lectriquement avec le tube de d?tecteur pour effectuer des d?tections de temp?rature. Un composant de joint torique peut ?tre s?lectionn? sur la base d'un diam?tre int?rieur dudit tube de d?tecteur et d'un diam?tre ext?rieur dudit ensemble de c?bles, ledit composant de joint torique ?tant serti pour sceller et prot?ger ledit tube de d?tecteur de toute erreur d'alignement et de placement et situ? coaxialement par rapport audit tube de d?tecteur et audit ensemble de c?bles, pour garantir ainsi une r?sistance m?canique am?lior?e et une pr?vention contre les fuites ou l'entr?e d'humidit? dans et hors du tube de d?tecteur.
대표청구항: An apparatus (100) for temperature sensing, comprising: a sensor tube (102) and an extension tube (112) connected to said sensor tube (102); a cable assembly (120) and an insulated sleeve (118), said cable assembly (120) being surrounded by said insulated sleeve (118), which in turn is located within said extension tube (112) said cable assembly (120) connected to and extending from said sensor tube (102) via said extension tube (112), wherein said cable assembly (120) communicates electrically with said sensor tube (102) for sensing operations thereof;characterized in that the apparatus (100) for temperature sensing further comprises: an O-ring component (117) embedded within the bounds of said extension tube (112) wherein said O-ring component (117) is selected for use with said cable assembly (120) and said sensor tube (102) based on an inner diameter of said sensor tube (102) and an outer diameter of said cable assembly (120), wherein said O-ring component (117) is crimped in order to-seal and protect said sensor tube (102) from de-alignment and misplacement and which O-ring component (117) is located co-axial to said sensor tube (102) and said cable assembly (120),wherein said O-ring component (117) is crimped by a double circular crimp at two crimped locations (203, 205), a said crimped location (203, 205) being implemented on each side of the O-ring component (117), thereby providing an enhanced mechanical strength and prevention against leakage or ingress of moisture from or to said sensor tube (102).
대표청구항(제2언어): Appareil (100) pour la d?tection de temp?ratures, comprenant : un tube de d?tection (102) et un tube d'extension (112) reli? audit tube de d?tection (102) ; un ensemble de c?bles (120) et un manchon isol? (118), ledit ensemble de c?bles (120) ?tant entour? par ledit manchon isol? (118), qui lui-m?me est positionn? ? l'int?rieur dudit tube d'extension (112), ledit ensemble de c?bles (120) ?tant reli? ? et s'?tendant depuis ledit tube de d?tection (102) par l'interm?diaire dudit tube d'extension (112), ledit ensemble de c?bles (120) communiquant ?lectriquement avec ledit tube de d?tection (102) pour d?tecter des op?rations de celui-ci ;caract?ris? en ce que l'appareil (100) pour la d?tection de temp?ratures comprend en outre : un composant ? joint torique (117) incorpor? dans les bords dudit tube d'extension (112), ledit composant ? joint torique (117) ?tant choisi pour ?tre utilis? avec ledit ensemble de c?bles (120) et ledit tube de d?tection (102) en fonction d'un diam?tre int?rieur dudit tube de d?tection (102) et d'un diam?tre ext?rieur dudit ensemble de c?bles (120), ledit composant ? joint torique (117) ?tant serti afin de sceller et prot?ger ledit tube de d?tection (102) contre un mauvais alignement et un mauvais positionnement, et ledit composant ? joint torique (117) ?tant positionn? coaxialement avec ledit tube de d?tection (102) et ledit ensemble de c?bles (120),dans lequel ledit composant ? oint torique (117) est serti par un double sertissage circulaire ? deux emplacements sertis (203, 205), un tel emplacement serti (203, 205) ?tant mis en oeuvre sur chaque c?t? du composant ? joint torique (117), apportant ainsi une r?sistance m?canique am?lior?e et une pr?vention contre la fuite ou l'entr?e d'humidit? depuis ou dans ledit tube de d?tection (102).

발명의 명칭: Intake air temperature sensor and thermal airflow meter including the same
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature d'air d'admission et d?bitm?tre d'air thermique l'incluant
요약: An intake air temperature sensor capable of detecting an intake air temperature highly accurately and at high speed. The intake air temperature sensor of the present invention includes: a secondary passage 7 taking in an intake airflow; a flow rate detecting element 13 disposed in the secondary passage 7; an intake air temperature detecting element 4 provided outside the secondary passage; a temperature sensor 9 detecting a temperature of a fitting section of the intake air temperature detecting element 4; a circuit board 11 disposed in a casing; and an integrated circuit 10 applying a correction process to an output of the intake air temperature detecting element 4 on the basis of signals output from the temperature sensor 9 and a flow rate detecting element 13.
대표청구항: An intake air temperature sensor including: a secondary passage (7) having an opening for taking in a part of an intake airflow,a flow rate detecting element (13) provided in the secondary passage (7),an electronic circuit (10) electrically connected to the flow rate detecting element (13), anda circuit mounting board (11) mounted with the electronic circuit,a casing (50) storing at least a part of the circuit mounting board (11),characterised in that the circuit mounting board (11) further comprises: an intake air temperature detecting element (4; 23; 40) provided outside the secondary passage (7) so as to be exposed to the intake airflow, anda temperature sensor (9) detecting a temperature of a fitting section of the intake air temperature detecting element (4; 23; 40), and further comprisingmeans for correcting an output of the intake air temperature detecting element (4; 23; 40) on the basis of an output of the temperature sensor (9) and an output of the flow rate detecting element (13).
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature d'air admis, incluant : un passage secondaire (7) ayant une ouverture pour pr?lever une partie d'un flux d'air admis,un ?l?ment de d?tection de d?bit (13) pr?vu dans le passage secondaire (7),un circuit ?lectronique (10) connect? ?lectriquement ? l'?l?ment de d?tection de d?bit (13), etune carte de montage de circuit (11) sur laquelle est mont? le circuit ?lectronique,un bo?tier (50) qui stocke au moins une partie de la carte de montage de circuit (11),caract?ris? en ce que la carte de montage de circuit (11) comprend en outre : un ?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature d'air admis (4 ; 23 ; 40) pr?vu ? l'ext?rieur du passage secondaire (7) de mani?re ? ?tre expos? aux flux d'air admis, etun capteur de temp?rature (9) qui d?tecte une temp?rature d'une section en raccord de l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature d'air admis (4 ; 23 ; 40), et comprenant en outreun moyen pour corriger une sortie de l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature d'air admis (4 ; 23 ; 40) en se basant sur une sortie du capteur de temp?rature (9) et sur une sortie de l'?l?ment de d?tection de d?bit (13).

요약: The sensor 100 comprises a temperature dependent resistor 101 mounted within a protective housing 110. The resistor 101 is connected to external circuitry via a pair of connecting wires 102. In use, variations in temperature of the exhaust gas cause a variation in the temperature experienced by the resistor 101 and consequently, the resistance of the resistor 101 also varies. The resistor 101 is mounted in a projecting end portion 111 of the housing which is of narrower cross-section than the bulk of the housing 110. The housing 110 is filled with a filler material 103. The filler material 103 provides support to the resistor 101 and the wires 102. In the present invention, unlike in prior art sensors, the filler material does not completely fill the housing 110. Instead a gap 104 is provided which is crossed by the wires 102. The gap 104 interrupts heat flow through the filler material and thus improves the thermal isolation of the resistor 101 and thereby the accuracy of the sensor 100. In an alternative embodiment, the sensor 100 additionally comprises an additional heat exchange element 105. The provision of the additional heat exchange element 105 improves the flow of heat from the exhaust gas to the resistor 101, thus providing a faster response when the temperature rapidy changes and higher measurement accuracy.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor (100), suitable for use in a vehicle exhaust, the sensor comprising: a temperature dependent resistor (101); a pair of connection wires (102) facilitating connection of the resistor to the external circuitry; a housing (110) in which the resistor is mounted and through which the wires run from the resistor to an exit point; and filler material (103) provided within the housing to support the wires and/or resistor wherein there is a gap (104) in the filler material across which the wires run, the gap being provided between the resistor and the exit point, characterised in that the filler material (103) surrounds the resistor (101) and in that the gap (104) extends fully between the side walls of the housing.
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature (100) appropri? pour ?tre utilis? dans un ?chappement de v?hicule, le capteur comprenant : une r?sistance d?pendant de la temp?rature (101) ; une paire de fils de connexion (102) facilitant la connexion de la r?sistance aux circuits externes ; un bo?tier (110) dans lequel la r?sistance est mont?e et ? travers lequel les fils s'?tendent de la r?sistance jusqu'? un point de sortie ; et une mati?re de remplissage (103) pr?vue ? l'int?rieur du bo?tier pour supporter les fils et/ou la r?sistance, dans lequel il y a un espace (104) dans la mati?re de remplissage sur lequel les fils s'?tendent, l'espace ?tant pr?vu entre la r?sistance et le point de sortie, caract?ris? en ce que la mati?re de remplissage (103) entoure la r?sistance (101) et en ce que l'espace (104) s'?tend compl?tement entre les parois lat?rales du bo?tier.

요약: The temperature sensor 1 is equipped with a temperature sensitive device 2 to be disposed inside an exhaust pipe of an internal combustion engine, signal lines 31 connected at a top end side to the temperature sensitive device 2 and at a rear end side to leads for connection with an external circuit, an inner member 18 having a sheath pin 3 in which the signal lines 31 are disposed, and an outer member 13 disposed to cover at least a portion of an outer periphery of the inner member 18. The outer member 13 includes a fixed portion (rib 6) to be fixed to an upper wall of the exhaust pipe, a retainer portion 132 retaining the inner member 18, and an extending portion 131 formed closer to a top end side than the retainer portion 132. The extending portion 131 includes a clearance portion 19 disposed so as to have an air gap between itself and the inner member 18 and a front interference portion 133 disposed in a condition that a maximum air gap between the front interference portion 133 and the inner member 18 in a radius direction is 0.2mm or less.
요약(제2언어): La pr?sente invention concerne une sonde de temp?rature (1) dot?e d'un ?l?ment de d?tection de la temp?rature (2) plac? ? l'int?rieur d'un canal d'?vacuation d'un moteur ? combustion interne ; un circuit de transmission (31), connect? ? l'?l?ment de d?tection de la temp?rature (2) sur un c?t? d'extr?mit? avant et connect? ? une ligne conductrice sur un c?t? d'extr?mit? arri?re pour la connexion du circuit externe ; un ?l?ment interne (18) ayant une broche de gaine (3) stockant le circuit de transmission (31) ? l'int?rieur ; et un ?l?ment externe (13) con?u pour couvrir au moins une partie de la circonf?rence externe de l'?l?ment interne (18). L'?l?ment externe (13) est dot? d'une section de fixation (ailette (6)) fix? ? la paroi externe du canal d'?vacuation ; une section de retenue (132) pour maintenir l'?l?ment interne (18) ; et une section de d?ploiement (131) form?e plus pr?s de l'extr?mit? avant que la section de retenue (132). La section de d?ploiement (131) est dot?e d'un section de passage (19) plac?e selon un intervalle par rapport ? l'?l?ment interne (18), et une section d'interf?rence de l'extr?mit? avant (133) con?ue pour avoir un intervalle maximum inf?rieur ou ?gal ? 0,2 mm par rapport ? l'?l?ment interne (18) dans le sens du diam?tre.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor (1) equipped with a temperature sensitive device (2) to be disposed inside an exhaust pipe of an internal combustion engine, signal lines (31) connected at a top end side to the temperature sensitive device (2) and at a rear end side to leads (17) for connection with an external circuit, an inner member (18) having a sheath pin (3) in which the signal lines (31) are disposed, and an outer member (13) disposed to cover at least a portion of an outer periphery of the inner member (18), said outer member (13) includes a fixed portion (6) to be fixed to an upper wall of the exhaust pipe, a retainer portion (132) retaining said inner member (18), and an extending portion (131) formed closer to a top end side than the retainer portion (132), the extending portion (131) includes a clearance portion (19) disposed so as to have an air gap between itself and said inner member (18) and a front interference portion (133) disposed in a condition that a maximum air gap (11) between the front interference portion (133) and the inner member (18) in a radius direction is 0.2mm or less, said temperature sensor being characterised in that the front interference portion (133) is not welded or fixed to the sheath pin (3) but is located in contact therewith or away therefrom through the air gap (11).

요약: A temperature sensor (100) includes a heat-sensitive element (21) having a thermistor sintered-body (22), an insulating support (31), an insulation sheath (41) and a housing tube (11). The insulating support (31) is in contact with the rear end of the heat-sensitive element (21) and the insulation sheath (41) is in contact with the rear end of the insulating support (31). The housing tube (11) accommodates the heat-sensitive element (21), the insulating support (31) and the insulation sheath (41). The housing tube (11) includes a sheath accommodation portion (14) which accommodates the insulation sheath (41) and a distal accommodation portion (13). The distal accommodation portion (13) is located toward the distal end of the housing tube (11) with respect to the sheath accommodation portion (14), is smaller in outside diameter than the sheath accommodation portion (14), and accommodates at least half of the insulating support (31) as measured from the axially distal end of the insulating support (31).
대표청구항: A temperature sensor (100) comprising: a heat-sensitive element (21) having a heat-sensitive portion (22) whose electric characteristic varies with temperature;an insulating support (31) in contact with a rear end of the heat-sensitive element (21) for supporting the heat-sensitive element (21);an insulation sheath (41) being in contact with a rear end of the insulating support (31) and allowing for wires (35, 36) electrically connected to the heat-sensitive portion (22) to extend therethrough; anda housing tube (11) formed into a closed-bottomed tubular shape having a closed distal end (10), and accommodating the heat-sensitive element (21), the insulating support (31), and the insulation sheath (41);wherein the housing tube (11) comprises a sheath accommodation portion (14, 15) which accommodates the insulation sheath (41), and a distal accommodation portion (13) which is located on a distal end (10) side of the housing tube with respect to the sheath accommodation portion (14, 15),the distal end accommodation portion having an outside diameter that is smaller than that of the sheath accommodation portion (14, 15), and accommodates at least half of the insulating support (31) as measured from an axially distal end of the insulating support (31), and a volume of the insulating support (31) is greater than that of the heat-sensitive element (21),characterized bythe insulation sheath (41) being formed from a ceramic insulator,a clearance being present between the ceramic insulation sheath (41) and the housing tube (11) along the entire length of the ceramic insulation sheath (41), andby the heat-sensitive element (21) further having a seal portion (29) which seals the heat-sensitive portion (22).
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature (100) comprenant : un ?l?ment thermosensible (21) ayant une partie thermosensible (22) dont la caract?ristique ?lectrique varie avec la temp?rature ;un support isolant (31) en contact avec une extr?mit? arri?re de l'?l?ment thermosensible (21) pour supporter l'?l?ment thermosensible (21) ;une gaine d'isolation (41) ?tant en contact avec une extr?mit? arri?re du support isolant (31) et permettant ? des fils (35, 36) ?lectriquement reli?s ? la partie thermosensible (22) de s'?tendre ? travers celle-ci ; etun tube d'enveloppe (11) form? dans une forme tubulaire ? fond ferm? ayant une extr?mit? distale ferm?e (10), et recevant l'?l?ment thermosensible (21), le support isolant (31) et la gaine d'isolation (41) ;dans lequel le tube d'enveloppe (11) comprend une partie de r?ception de gaine (14, 15) qui re?oit la gaine d'isolation (41), et une partie de r?ception distale (13) qui est situ?e sur un c?t? d'extr?mit? distale (10) du tube d'enveloppe par rapport ? la partie de r?ception de gaine (14, 15),la partie de r?ception d'extr?mit? distale ayant un diam?tre ext?rieur qui est plus petit que celui de la partie de r?ception de gaine (14, 15), et re?oit au moins la moiti? du support isolant (31) lorsque mesur? ? partir d'une extr?mit? axialement distale du support isolant (31), et un volume de support isolant (31) est plus grand que celui de l'?l?ment thermosensible (21),caract?ris? en ce quela gaine d'isolation (41) est form?e ? partir d'un isolant en c?ramique,un espace est pr?sent entre la gaine d'isolation en c?ramique (41) et le tube d'enveloppe (11) le long de la longueur compl?te de la gaine d'isolation en c?ramique (41), eten ce que l'?l?ment thermosensible (21) a en outre une partie d'?tanch?it? 요약: A temperature sensor including a temperature sensing element (102) having a temperature sensing unit (103) and a pair of device electrode wires (104) extending from the temperature sensing unit; a sheath member (106) including a sheath wire (108) connected at a junction (110) to one of the device electrode wires and a sheath outer pipe (107) retaining the sheath wire in an insulating material (114); an inner tube (112) which has a bottomed cylindrical shape, the inner tube accommodating the temperature sensing element and the junction in a bottom portion side of the inner tube serving as a leading end of the temperature sensor, and extending in an extension direction of the device electrode wire and the sheath wire; and an outer tube (120) which has a bottomed cylindrical shape including a gas inlet hole (122a, 122b, 122c), the outer tube covering the inner tube, and being spaced from the inner tube on a leading end side of the junction when viewed in a direction perpendicular to an axial direction of the inner tube.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: a temperature sensing element (102) having a temperature sensing unit (103) and a pair of device electrode wires (104) extending from the temperature sensing unit (103);a sheath member (106) including a sheath wire (108) connected at a junction (110) to at least one of the device electrode wires (104) and a sheath outer pipe (107) retaining the sheath wire (108) in an insulating material; anda first tube (112) made of a metal which has a bottomed cylindrical shape, said first tube (112) accommodating the temperature sensing element (102) and the junction (110) in a bottom portion side of the first tube (112) serving as a leading end of the temperature sensor, and extending in an extension direction of the device electrode wire (104) and the sheath wire (108);characterized bya second tube (120) which has a bottomed cylindrical shape including a plurality of gas inlet holes (122a-c),said first tube being an inner tube (112), and said second tube being an outer tube (120), said outer tube (120) covering the inner tube (112), and being spaced from the inner tube (112) on a leading end side of the junction (110) when viewed in a direction perpendicular to an axial direction of the inner tube (112),wherein all of the gas inlet holes (122a-c) are disposed on the leading end side of the junction (110) when viewed in a direction perpendicular to the axial direction of the inner tube (112), andwherein the insulating material is filled between the temperature sensing element (102) and an inner surface of the inner tube (112).
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature comprenant : un ?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature (102) ayant une unit? de d?tection de temp?rature (103) et une paire de fils d'?lectrode de dispositif (104) s'?tendant ? partir de l'unit? de d?tection de temp?rature (103) ;un organe de gaine (106) incluant un fil de gaine (108) reli? ? une jonction (110) ? au moins l'un des fils d'?lectrode de dispositif (104) et un tuyau ext?rieur de gaine (107) retenant le fil de gaine (108) dans un mat?riau isolant ; etun premier tube (112) fait d'un m?tal qui a une forme cylindrique avec un fond, ledit premier tube (112) recevant l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature (102) et la jonction (110) dans un c?t? de portion de fond du premier tube (112) servant d'extr?mit? avant du capteur de temp?rature, et s'?tendant dans une direction d'extension du fil d'?lectrode de dispositif (104) et du fil de gaine (108) ;caract?ris? parun second tube (120) qui a une forme cylindrique avec un fond incluant une pluralit? de trous d'entr?e de gaz (122a-c),ledit premier tube ?tant un tube int?rieur (112), et ledit second tube ?tant un tube ext?rieur (120), ledit tube ext?rieur (120) recouvrant le tube int?rieur (112), et ?tant espac? du tube int?rieur (112) sur un c?t? d'extr?mit? avant de la jonction (110) lorsque vu dans une direction perpendiculaire ? une direction axiale du tube int?rieur (112),dans lequel tous les trous d'entr?e de gaz (122a-c) sont dispos?s sur le c?t? d'extr?mit? avant de la jonction (110) lorsque vus dans une direction perpendiculaire ? la direction axiale du tube int?rieur (112), etdans lequel le mat?riau isolant est rempli entre l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature (102) et une surface int?rieure du tube int?rieur (112).

발명의 명칭: Pressure sensor device including temperature sensor contained in common housing
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Dispositif de pression comprenant un capteur de temp?rature contenu dans un bo?tier courant
요약: A pressure sensor device (101) includes a temperature sensor (70) mounted on a common housing composed of a resin head (10) and a resin pipe (35) both hermetically connected to each other. The pressure sensor device is mounted on, for example, on an intake manifold (90) of an internal combustion engine to measure an amount of air supplied to the engine based on detected pressure and temperature of the air. A pressure sensor (20) is mounted on the resin head (10), and a temperature sensor element (70) is supported in the resin pipe (35). A lead wire (71) of the temperature sensor element such as a thermistor is electrically connected to a conductor bar (60) embedded in the resin pipe (35). The temperature sensor (70) is directly exposed to the air in the intake manifold (90), and a size of the temperature sensor and the lead wire is made small to make a response speed of the temperature sensor element high.
대표청구항: A pressure sensor device (101) comprising: a housing composed of a resin head (10) and a resin pipe (35), one end (34a) of the resin pipe being connected to the resin head and the other end (34b) of the resin pipe being open to outside;terminals (11), having a first terminal and a second terminal, to be electrically connected to an outside circuit, the terminals being insert-molded in the resin head (10);a pressure sensor element (20) for detecting pressure of fluid introduced into the housing through the resin pipe (35), the pressure sensor element being electrically connected to the first terminal and mounted on the resin head;a conductor bar (60) embedded in the resin pipe (35) with its first end (60a) and a second end (60b) exposed outside; anda temperature sensor element (70) for detecting temperature of the fluid, the temperature sensor element being positioned close to the open end of the resin pipe, wherein the second end (60b) of the conductor bar (60) is positioned close to the open end of the resin pipe (35); characterized in thatthe first end (60a) of the conductor bar (60) is electrically connected to the second terminal;the second end (60b) of the conductor bar (60) is electrically connected to the temperature sensor element through a lead wire (71);a portion connecting the second end (60b) of the conductor bar to the lead wire (71) is covered with protecting resin (36);the temperature sensor element is a thermistor element (70); anda length of the lead wire (71) is longer than 15 mm and shorter than 30 mm.
대표청구항(제2언어): Dispositif capteur de pression (101), comprenant : un bo?tier compos? d'une t?te en r?sine (10) et d'un tuyau en r?sine (35), une extr?mit? (34a) du tuyau en r?sine ?tant reli?e ? la t?te en r?sine et l'autre extr?mit? (34b) du tuyau en r?sine ?tant ouverte vers l'ext?rieur ;des bornes (11), ayant une premi?re borne et une deuxi?me borne, devant ?tre ?lectriquement reli?es ? un circuit ext?rieur, les bornes ?tant moul?es par insertion dans la t?te en r?sine (10) ;un ?l?ment de capteur de pression (20) destin? ? d?tecter une pression d'un fluide introduit dans le bo?tier ? travers le tuyau en r?sine (35), l'?l?ment de capteur de pression ?tant ?lectriquement reli? ? la premi?re borne et mont? sur la t?te en r?sine ;une barre conductrice (60) int?gr?e dans le tuyau en r?sine (35) avec sa premi?re extr?mit? (60a) et une deuxi?me extr?mit? (60b) expos?e ? l'ext?rieur ; etun ?l?ment de capteur de temp?rature (70) destin? ? d?tecter une temp?rature du fluide, l'?l?ment de capteur de temp?rature ?tant positionn? ? proximit? de l'extr?mit? ouverte du tuyau en r?sine, o? la deuxi?me extr?mit? (60b) de la barre conductrice (60) est positionn?e ? proximit? de l'extr?mit? ouverte du tuyau en r?sine (35) ; caract?ris? en ce quela premi?re extr?mit? (60a) de la barre conductrice (60) est ?lectriquement reli?e ? la deuxi?me borne ;la deuxi?me extr?mit? (60b) de la barre conductrice (60) est ?lectriquement reli?e ? l'?l?ment de capteur de temp?rature ? travers un fil conducteur (71) ;une partie reliant la deuxi?me extr?mit? (60b) de la barre conductrice au fil conducteur (71) est recouverte d'une r?sine de protection (36) ;l'?l?ment de capteur de temp?rature est un ?l?ment de thermistor (70) ; etune longueur du fil conducteur (71) est sup?rieure ? 15 mm et inf?rieure ? 30 mm.
