발명의 명칭: SINTERED ELECTROCONDUCTIVE OXIDE, THERMISTOR ELEMENT USING SINTERED ELECTROCONDUCTIVE OXIDE, AND TEMPERATURE SENSOR USING THERMISTOR ELEMENT
발명의 명칭(제2언어): OXYDE FRITTE ELECTROCONDUCTEUR, ELEMENT DE THERMISTANCE UTILISANT CET OXYDE FRITTE ELECTROCONDUCTEUR, ET CAPTEUR DE TEMPERATURE UTILISANT CET ELEMENT DE THERMISTANCE
요약: According to an aspect of the present invention, there is provided a sintered electroconductive oxide containing a perovskite phase of perovskite-type crystal structure represented by the composition formula: M1aM2bM3cAldCreOf where M1 is at least one of elements of group 3A other than La; M2 is at least one of elements of group 2A; M3 is at least one of elements of groups 4A, 5A, 6A, 7A and 8 other than Cr; and a, b, c, d, e and f satisfy the following conditional expressions: 0.600≤a≤1.000; 0≤b≤0.400; 0.150≤c<0.600; 0.400≤d≤0.800; 0<e≤0.050; 0<e/c+e≤0.18; and 2.80≤f≤3.30. With the use of this conductive oxide sintered body, it becomes possible to carry out proper temperature measurements over the temperature range from a low temperature of -40°C to a high temperature of 900°C or higher.
요약(제2언어): L'invention concerne un oxyde fritt? ?lectroconducteur, contenant une phase p?rovskite et ayant une formule empirique repr?sent?e par la formule : M1aM2bM3cAldCreOf, dans laquelle M1 repr?sente au moins un ?l?ment du groupe d'?l?ments 3A, except? La, M2 repr?sente au moins un ?l?ment du groupe d'?l?ments 2A, M3 repr?sente au moins un ?l?ment des groupes d'?l?ments 4A, 5A, 6A, 7A et 8, except? Cr (a, b, c, d, e et f satisfaisant respectivement ? 0,600 ≤ a ≤ 1,000, 0 ≤ b ≤ 0,400, 0,150 ≤ c < 0,600, 0,400 ≤ d ≤ 0,800, 0 < e ≤ 0,050, 0 < e/(c + e) ≤ 0,18 et 2,80 ≤ f ≤ 3,30). L'oxyde fritt? ?lectroconducteur peut ?tre utilis? pour d?tecter une temp?rature adapt?e dans une gamme de temp?ratures pouvant aller d'une temp?rature aussi basse que -40 °C jusqu'? une temp?rature aussi ?lev?e que 900 °C ou plus.
대표청구항: A sintered electroconductive oxide containing a perovskite phase of perovskite-type crystal structure represented by the composition formula: M1aM2bM3cAldCreOf where M1 is at least one of elements of group 3A other than La; M2 is at least one of elements of group 2A; M3 is at least one of elements of groups 4A, 5A, 6A, 7A and 8 other than Cr; and a, b, c, d, e and f satisfy the following conditional expressions: 0.820≤a≤0.950;[Image]0.050≤b≤0.180;[Image]0.181≤c≤0.585;[Image]0.410≤d≤0.790;[Image]0.005≤e≤0.050;[Image]0<e/c+e≤0.18;[Image]and 2.91≤f≤3.27.[Image]
대표청구항(제2언어): Oxyde ?lectroconducteur fritt? contenant une phase p?rovskite ayant une structure cristalline de type p?rovskite repr?sent?e par la formule compositionnelle suivante : M1aM2bM3cAldCreOf o? M1 est au moins un des ?l?ments du groupe 3A autres que La ; M2 est au moins un des ?l?ments du groupe 2A ; M3 est au moins un des ?l?ments des groupes 4A, 5A, 6A, 7A et 8 autres que Cr ; et a, b, c, d, e et f satisfont aux expressions conditionnelles suivantes : 0,820≤a≤0,950;[Image]0,050≤b≤0,180;[Image]0,181≤c≤0,585;[Image]0,410≤d≤0,790;[Image]0,005≤e≤0,050;[Image]0<e/c+e≤0,18;[Image]et 2,91≤f≤3,27.[Image]

요약: A temperature sensor including: a temperature sensing element (102) having a temperature sensing unit (103) and a pair of device electrode wires (104); a sheath member (106) having a sheath wire (108) connected at a junction (110) to at least one of the device electrode wires and a sheath outer pipe (107) retaining the sheath wire in an insulating material (114); an inner tube (112) which has a bottomed cylindrical shape; and a cylindrical outer tube (120) having an open end, covering the inner tube such that the open end is located at a front end side of the junction and in a region to the rear end side of or aligned with the front end of the inner tube, and being spaced from the inner tube at the front end side of the junction.
대표청구항: A gas temperature sensor comprising: a temperature sensing element (102) having a temperature sensing unit (103) and a pair of device electrode wires (104) extending from the temperature sensing unit (103);a sheath member (106) including a sheath wire (108) connected at a junction (110) to at least one of the device electrode wires and a sheath outer pipe (104) retaining the sheath wire in an insulating material;a first tube (112) made of a metal which has a bottomed cylindrical shape, said first tube (112) accommodating the temperature sensing element (102) and the junction (110) in a bottom portion side of the first tube (112) serving as a front end of the gas temperature sensor, and extending in an extension direction of the device electrode wire (104) and the sheath wire (108); and a second cylindrical tube (120) having an open end,characterized bythe first tube being an inner tube, and the second tube being an outer tube, said outer tube covering the inner tube such that the open front end (120a) of the outer tube (120) is located at a front end side of the junction (110) and at the rear end side of, or aligned with the front end (112a) of the inner tube, when viewed from a direction perpendicular to an axial direction of the inner tube (112), and being spaced from the inner tube at the front end side of the junction,wherein the insulating material (114) is filled between the temperature sensing element (102) and an inner surface of the inner tube (112).
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature de gaz comprenant : un ?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature (102) ayant une unit? de d?tection de temp?rature (103) et une paire de fils d'?lectrode de dispositif (104) s'?tendant ? partir de l'unit? de d?tection de temp?rature (103) ;un organe de gaine (106) incluant un fil de gaine (108) reli? en une jonction (110) ? au moins l'un des fils d'?lectrode de dispositif et un tuyau ext?rieur de gaine (104) retenant le fil de gaine dans un mat?riau isolant ;un premier tube (112) fait d'un m?tal qui a une forme cylindrique par le dessous, ledit premier tube (112) recevant l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature (102) et la jonction (110) dans un c?t? de portion inf?rieur du premier tube (112) servant d'extr?mit? avant du capteur de temp?rature de gaz, et s'?tendant dans une direction d'extension du fil d'?lectrode de dispositif (104) et du fil de gaine (108) ; etun second tube cylindrique (120) ayant une extr?mit? ouverte,caract?ris? ce quele premier tube est un tube int?rieur, et le second tube est un tube ext?rieur, ledit tube ext?rieur recouvrant le tube int?rieur de telle sorte que l'extr?mit? avant ouverte (120a) du tube ext?rieur (120) est situ?e sur un c?t? d'extr?mit? avant de la jonction (110) et sur le c?t? d'extr?mit? arri?re de l'extr?mit? avant (112a) du tube int?rieur, ou align?e avec celle-ci, lorsque vue ? partir d'une direction perpendiculaire ? une direction axiale du tube int?rieur (112), et ?tant espac?e du tube int?rieur sur le c?t? d'extr?mit? avant de la jonction,dans lequel le mat?riau isolant (114) est charg? entre l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature (102) et une surface int?rieure du tube int?rieur (112).

발명의 명칭: Conductive sintered oxide, thermistor element including the same, and temperature sensor including the same
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Oxyde fritt? conducteur, ?l?ment ? thermistor l'incluant et capteur de temp?rature l'incluant
요약: A conductive sintered oxide which includes: a conductive crystal phase having a perovskite structure represented by (RE1-cSrc)MdO3, in which RE is a group of elements consisting of Yb and/or Lu and at least one element selected from Group IIIA elements excluding Yb, Lu and La, and M is a group of elements consisting of Al and at least one element selected from Groups IVA, VA, VIA, VIIA and VIII, a first insulating crystal phase represented by RE2O3, and a second insulating crystal phase represented by SrAl2O4. The conductive crystal phase has a coefficient c satisfying 0.18<c<0.50 and has a coefficient d satisfying 0.67≤d≤0.93. A content of a third insulating crystal phase represented by RE4Al2O9, the content of which may be zero, is smaller than the content of each of the first and second insulating crystal phases.
대표청구항: A conductive sintered oxide which comprises: a conductive crystal phase having a perovskite structure represented by (RE1-cSrc)MdO3, in whichRE is a group of elements consisting of Yb and/or Lu and at least one element selected from Group IIIA excluding Yb, Lu and La andM is a group of elements consisting of Al and at least one element selected from Groups IVA, VA, VIA, VIIA and VIII,a first insulating crystal phase represented by RE2O3, in which RE is as defined above, anda second insulating crystal phase represented by SrAl2O4, whereinthe conductive crystal phase has a coefficient c which satisfies 0.18<c<0.50,the conductive crystal phase has a coefficient d satisfying 0.67≤d≤0.93, the coefficient d indicating a ratio between an amount of the element group RE1-cSrc constituting A sites and the amount of the element group M constituting B sites of the conductive crystal phase, anda content of a third insulating crystal phase represented by RE4Al2O9, the content of which may be zero, is smaller than the content of the first insulating crystal phase and is smaller than the content of the second insulating crystal phase.
대표청구항(제2언어): Oxyde fritt? conducteur qui comprend : une phase cristalline conductrice ayant une structure de type p?rovskite repr?sent?e par (RE1-cSrc)MdO3, dans laquelleRE repr?sente un groupe d'?l?ments constitu? de Yb et/ou Lu et d'au moins un ?l?ment choisi parmi le Groupe IIIA ? l'exclusion de Yb, Lu et La etM repr?sente un groupe d'?l?ments constitu? de Al et d'au moins un ?l?ment choisi parmi les Groupes IVA, VA, VIA, VIIA et VIII,une premi?re phase cristalline isolante repr?sent?e par RE2O3, dans laquelle RE est tel que d?fini ci-dessus, etune deuxi?me phase cristalline isolante repr?sent?e par SrAl2O4, dans lequel la phase cristalline conductrice a un coefficient c qui satisfait 0,18 < c < 0,50,la phase cristalline conductrice a un coefficient d satisfaisant 0,67 ≤ d ≤ 0,93, le coefficient d indiquant un rapport entre une quantit? du groupe d'?l?ments RE1-cSrc constituant les sites A et la quantit? du groupe d'?l?ments M constituant les sites B de la phase cristalline conductrice, etune teneur d'une troisi?me phase cristalline isolante repr?sent?e par RE4Al2O9, dont la teneur peut ?tre ?gale ? z?ro, est inf?rieure ? la teneur de la premi?re phase cristalline isolante et est inf?rieure ? la teneur de la deuxi?me phase cristalline isolante.

요약: The invention relates to a temperature sensor (1) for a motor vehicle comprising: -a housing (3) defining an internal volume comprising a temperature sensitive element (5), -electrical wires (9) linked electrically to said temperature sensitive element (5) and configured to transmit an item of temperature information from said sensitive element (5) to the exterior of the housing (3), -a seal (13) partially surrounding the said electrical wires (9) so as to isolate the sensitive element (5) with respect to the exterior of the housing (3), the seal (13) extending preferably in a direction, termed the longitudinal direction. According to the invention, said sensor (1) furthermore comprises a guidance means (15) integral with said seal (13) for the guiding of said electrical wires (9) out of said sensor, said guidance means (15) lying in the extension of said seal (13) according to the longitudinal direction of said seal (13) from a central zone of the seal (13) towards the exterior of said sensor housing (3), and the cross section of said guidance means (15) being of smaller dimension than that of the cross section of the seal (13), at least one portion of said guidance means (15) lying outside the housing. FIGURE:

요약: A temperature sensor is provided. The temperature sensor includes: a temperature sensitive element having a temperature sensitive body and an element electrode wire; a sheath member having an external cylinder, the sheath member encompassing a sheath core wire to be bonded to the element electrode wire in the external cylinder; an enclosing member having a bottom-closed cylindrical shape extending in an axial direction, at least the temperature sensitive element and a bond portion of the element electrode wire and the sheath core wire being accommodated in an internal space of the bottom-closed cylindrical shape, and a holding member that is filled in the internal space, wherein an air gap is provided at least between an outer surface of the temperature sensitive body and the holding member so as to permit displacement of the temperature sensitive body in a direction intersecting the axial direction of the enclosing member.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: a temperature sensitive element (102) that has a temperature sensitive body (103) and an element electrode wire (104);a sheath member (106) that has an external cylinder, the sheath member (106) encompassing a sheath core wire (108) bonded to the element electrode wire (104) in the external cylinder;an enclosing member (112) that has a bottom-closed cylindrical shape extending in an axial direction with a front end closed, at least the temperature sensitive element (102) and a bond portion (110) of the element electrode wire (104) and the sheath core wire (108) being accommodated in an internal space of the bottom-closed cylindrical shape, anda holding member (114) that is filled in the internal space,characterized in thatan air gap (105; 105a) is provided at least between an outer surface of the temperature sensitive body (103) and the holding member (114) so as to permit displacement of the temperature sensitive body (103) in a direction intersecting the axial direction of the enclosing member (112).
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature comprenant : un ?l?ment (102) sensible ? la temp?rature ayant un corps (103) sensible ? la temp?rature et un fil ?lectrode ?l?ment (104) ;un membre de gainage (106) ayant un cylindre externe, le membre de gainage (106) englobant un fil de coeur de gainage (108) li? au fil ?lectrode ?l?ment (104) dans le cylindre externe ;un membre d'enveloppe (112) ayant une forme cylindrique ? base ferm?e s'?tendant dans une direction axiale avec une extr?mit? avant ferm?e, au moins l'?l?ment (102) sensible ? la temp?rature et une portion de liaison (110) du fil ?lectrode ?l?ment (104) et du fil de coeur de gainage (108) ?tant accommod?s dans un espace interne de la forme cylindrique ? base ferm?e, etun membre de maintien (114), l'espace interne ?tant rempli par le membre de maintien (114),caract?ris? en ce queun intervalle d'air (105 ; 105a) est fourni au moins entre une surface externe du corps (103) sensible ? la temp?rature et le membre de maintien (114) afin de permettre le d?placement du corps (103) sensible ? la temp?rature dans une direction croisant la direction axiale du membre d'enveloppe (112).

요약: An object is to provide a temperature sensor having improved fracture strength of a weld zone between an element electrode wire and a sheath core wire. In the temperature sensor, with the weld zone being viewed from a direction from which a contact portion between the element electrode wire and the sheath core wire is visible, there is determined a center point of a line segment connecting a point located on the surface of the weld zone and closest to a temperature-sensing portion and a point located on the surface and farthest from the temperature-sensing portion. When a section of the weld zone is taken orthogonally to the axial direction of a sheath member and in such a manner as to pass through the center point, as viewed on the section, L/D is equal to or greater than 0.6, wherein D represents the diameter of the element electrode wire, and L represents the length of a chord connecting a first weld point and a second weld point, the first weld point representing an intersection of the weld zone and the circumference of the element electrode wire located toward a side from which the laser beam is radiated, and the second weld point representing an intersection of the weld zone and an imaginary circumference which starts from the first weld point and traces, within the weld zone, the circumference of the element electrode wire as viewed before welding.
요약(제2언어): L'invention concerne un capteur de temp?rature avec une plus grande r?sistance ? la rupture d’une soudure entre le fil d’?lectrode d’?l?ment et le fil de noyau d'enveloppe. Dans le capteur de temp?rature, en regardant la soudure de la direction de contact entre le fil d’?lectrode d’?l?ment et le fil de noyau d'enveloppe, on d?termine le point m?dian d’une ligne connectant le point le plus proche et le point le plus ?loign? de la partie d?tection de la temp?rature ? la surface de soudure. Dans la coupe transversale passant ? travers le point m?dian des coupes transversales de soudure qui sont perpendiculaires ? la direction axiale de l’?l?ment enveloppe, le diam?tre du fil d’?lectrode d’?l?ment est appel? D, et un point correspondant ? l’intersection de la soudure et la circonf?rence du fil d’?lectrode d’?l?ment et plus proche du c?t? depuis lequel on applique le faisceau laser, s’appelle premier point de soudure. En tra?ant la circonf?rence de pr?-soudure (d?sign?e ensuite “circonf?rence virtuelle") du fil d’?lectrode d’?l?ment sur la soudure et en progressant sur la soudure le long de la circonf?rence virtuelle en partant du premier point de soudure, le point auquel la soudure et la circonf?rence virtuelle se coupent s’appelle second point de soudure. Lorsque la longueur d'une ligne connectant le premier point de soudure et le second point de soudure est appel?e L, le capteur de temp?rature est caract?ris? en ce que L/D ? 0,6
대표청구항: A temperature sensor (200) comprising: a temperature-sensing element (202) having a temperature-sensing portion (203) and a circular columnar element electrode wire (204) connected at a front end portion to the temperature-sensing portion (203) and extending rearward from the temperature-sensing portion (203),a sheath member (206) having a circular columnar sheath core wire (208) overlapping a periphery of a rear end portion of the element electrode wire (204) and electrically communicating with the element electrode wire (204), anda weld zone (280) formed through radiation of a laser beam to an overlapping region (281) of the element electrode wire (204) and the sheath core wire (208) and connecting the element electrode wire (204) and the sheath core wire (208) together,characterized in thatwhen, with the weld zone (280) being viewed from a direction from which a contact portion (289) between the element electrode wire (204) and the sheath core wire (208) is visible, there is determined a center point (285) of a line segment connecting a point (283) located on a surface of the weld zone (280) and closest to the temperature-sensing portion (203) and a point (284) located on the surface and farthest from the temperature-sensing portion (203), anda section of the weld zone (280) is taken orthogonally to an axial direction of the sheath member (206) and in such a manner as to pass through the center point (285),as viewed on the section, L/D is equal to or greater than 0.6, wherein D represents a diameter of the element electrode wire (204), and L represents a length of a chord connecting a first weld point (286) and a second weld point (288), the first weld point (286) representing an intersection of the weld zone (280) and a circumference of the element electrode wire (204) located toward a side from which the laser beam is radiated, and the second weld point (288) representing an intersection of the weld zone (280) and an imaginary circumference (282) which starts from the first weld point (286) and traces, within the weld zone (280), the circumference of the element electrode wire (204) as viewed before welding.

(286) et un second point soud? (288), le premier point soud? (286) repr?sentant une intersection de la zone soud?e (280) et une circonf?rence du fil ?lectrode ?l?ment (204) situ?e vers un c?t? depuis lequel le faisceau laser est rayonn?, et le second point soud? (288) repr?sentant une intersection de la zone soud?e (280) et une circonf?rence imaginaire (282) qui commence depuis le premier point soud? (286) et trace, ? l'int?rieur de la zone soud?e (280), la circonf?rence du fil ?lectrode ?l?ment (204) telle que vue avant le soudage.

발명의 명칭: SINTERED COMPACT FOR THERMISTOR ELEMENT, PROCESS FOR PRODUCING THE SAME, THERMISTOR ELEMENT AND TEMPERATURE SENSOR
발명의 명칭(제2언어): PIECE FRITTE POUR ELEMENT THERMISTANCE, SON PROCEDE D'OBTENTION, ELEMENT THERMISTANCE ET CAPTEUR DE TEMPERATURE
요약: A sintered body for thermistor element of the invention is a sintered body for thermistor element containing Sr, Y, Mn, Al, Fe, and O, wherein not only respective liquid crystal phases of a perovskite type oxide and a garnet type oxide are contained, but also a liquid crystal phase of at least one of an Sr-Al based oxide and an Sr-Fe based oxide. FeYO3 and/or AlYO3 is selected as the foregoing perovskite type oxide, and at least one member selected from Y3 Al5 O12 , Al2 Fe3 Y3 O12 , and Al3 Fe2 Y3 O12 is selected as the foregoing garnet type oxide, respectively by the powder X-ray diffraction analysis.
요약(제2언어): L'invention concerne un ?l?ment compact fritt? pour ?l?ment thermistor comprenant Sr, Y, Mn, Al, Fe et O, o? non seulement les phases cristallines respectives de l'oxyde de p?rovskite et de l'oxyde de grenat mais ?galement une phase cristalline d'au moins un oxyde de Sr-Al et un oxyde de Sr-Fe sont contenues. Dans les analyses par diffractom?trie ? rayon X sous forme de poudre, FeYO3 et/ou AlYO3 est identifi? comme oxyde de p?rovskite et au moins un ?l?ment s?lectionn? parmi Y3 Al5 O12 , Al2 Fe3 Y3 O12 et Al3 Fe2 Y3 O12 est identifi? comme ?tant l'oxyde de grenat.
대표청구항: A sintered body for thermistor elements containing Sr, Y, Mn, Al, Fe, and O, which is characterized in that not only crystal phases of a perovskite type oxide and a garnet type oxide are contained, but also a crystal phase of of an Sr-Al based oxide or an Sr-Fe based oxide or both is contained, wherein neither Cr element nor Ti element is detected as a result of surface analysis of a sintered body for the thermistor element by EDS.
대표청구항(제2언어): Corps fritt? pour ?l?ments de thermistance contenant Sr, Y, Mn, Al, Fe et O, qui est caract?ris? en ce que non seulement des phases cristallines d'un oxyde de type p?rovskite et d'un oxyde de type grenat sont contenues, mais ?galement une phase cristalline d'un oxyde ? base de Sr-Al ou d'un oxyde ? base de Sr-Fe, ou les deux, est/sont contenue(s), dans lequel ni l'?l?ment Cr, ni l'?l?ment Ti n'est d?tect? suite ? une analyse de surface d'un corps fritt? pour l'?l?ment de thermistance par EDS.

발명의 명칭: EXHAUST GAS TEMPERATURE SENSOR INCLUDING STRAIN RELIEF AND/OR ANTI-VIBRATION SLEEVE
발명의 명칭(제2언어): CAPTEUR DE TEMP?RATURE DE GAZ D'?CHAPPEMENT COMPRENANT UN MANCHON DE D?TENTE DES CONTRAINTES ET/OU ANTIVIBRATION
요약: A temperature sensor includes a housing and a temperature sensing element disposed in the housing. Electrical connections may extend from the temperature sensing element through the housing and an epoxy may be disposed in the housing, wherein the epoxy may at least partially around the temperature sensing element. The epoxy may provide a thermal pathway between the sensing element and the housing and may be being flexible to accommodate different rates of thermal expansion between the temperature sensing element and the electrical connections without requiring a separate mechanical strain relief. A temperature sensor system includes a temperature sensor and a mineral insulated cable coupled to the temperature sensor. The temperature sensor may be configured to be removably coupled to the mineral insulated cable via a stop flange and a sleeve coupled to the mineral insulated cable. The sleeve may be configured to provide stability and reduce vibrational stress to the temperature sensor system.
요약(제2언어): L'invention porte sur un capteur de temp?rature, qui comprend un bo?tier et un ?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature dispos? dans le bo?tier. Des connexions ?lectriques peuvent s'?tendre ? partir de l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature ? travers le bo?tier, et de l'?poxy peut ?tre dispos? dans le bo?tier, l'?poxy pouvant ?tre dispos? au moins partiellement autour de l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature. L'?poxy peut produire un trajet thermique entre l'?l?ment de d?tection et le bo?tier, et peut ?tre souple, de fa?on ? compenser des taux de dilation thermique diff?rents entre l'?l?ment de d?tection de temp?rature et les connexions ?lectriques, sans n?cessiter une d?tente des contraintes m?caniques s?par?e. Un syst?me de capteur de temp?rature comprend un capteur de temp?rature et un c?ble isol? min?ral coupl? au capteur de temp?rature. Le capteur de temp?rature peut ?tre configur? de fa?on ? ?tre coupl? de fa?on amovible au c?ble isol? min?ral par l'interm?diaire d'une bride d'arr?t et d'un manchon coupl? au c?ble isol? min?ral. Le manchon peut ?tre configur? de fa?on ? produire une stabilit? et ? r?duire les contraintes de vibration sur le syst?me de capteur de temp?rature.

요약: A temperature sensor has a temperature sensitive element (101) to be exposed at a high temperature of not less than 750°C and comprised of a thermistor element (102), a sheath pin (104), an anti-vibration filler (111), and a metal cover case (103) fixed to an end part of the sheath pin (104). The metal cover case (103) accommodates the sheath pin (104) and the thermistor element (102). The filler (111) is made of a porous insulation material having a pore ratio within a range of 30 to 70% and filled around the thermistor element (102) in the metal cover case (103).
대표청구항: A temperature sensor (S) comprising: a temperature sensitive element (101), to be exposed under an usage environment at a temperature of not less than 750°C, comprised of a thermistor element (102) for detecting a temperature;a sheath pin (104) composed of a cylindrical metal case (141) and a pair of metal wires (142) which are insulated to each other in the cylindrical metal case (141) and electrically connected to the thermistor element (102) to output a detection signal of the thermistor element (102);a metal cover case (103) fixed to an end part of the sheath pin (104) and accommodating the sheath pin (104) and the thermistor element (102); andan anti-vibration filler (111), made of a porous insulation material, filled around the thermistor element (102) in the metal cover case (103),characterized in thatthe anti-vibration filler (111) has a pore ratio within a range of 30 to 70%.
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature (S) comprenant : un ?l?ment sensible ? la temp?rature (101), devant ?tre expos? dans un environnement d'utilisation ? une temp?rature de pas moins de 750 °C, compos? d'un ?l?ment ? thermistance (102) pour d?tecter une temp?rature ;une broche gaine (104) compos? d'un bo?tier m?tallique cylindrique (141) et d'une paire de fils m?talliques (142) qui sont isol?s l'un de l'autre dans le bo?tier m?tallique cylindrique (141) et ?lectriquement connect?s ? l'?l?ment ? thermistance (102) afin d'?mettre en sortie un signal de d?tection de l'?l?ment ? thermistance (102) ;un bo?tier de recouvrement m?tallique (103) fix? ? une partie d'extr?mit? de la broche gaine (104) et logeant la broche gaine (104) et l'?l?ment ? thermistance (102) ; etune garniture anti-vibration (111) constitu?e d'un mat?riau isolant poreux, garnie autour de l'?l?ment de thermistance (102) dans le bo?tier de recouvrement m?tallique (103)caract?ris? en ce quela garniture anti-vibration (111) a un taux de porosit? dans une plage de 30 ? 70 %.

요약: An intake temperature sensor 9 capable of precisely detecting the temperature of intake at high speed even in a low air mass flow zone is provided. In an intake temperature sensor 9 having a temperature detecting element 6 inserted in an opening provided in an intake pipe 3 to be disposed in the intake pipe, a temperature detecting element is mechanically joined with a heat sink 4 directly exposed to the flow of the intake flowing in the intake pipe, and the temperature of the intake is output based on an output obtained from the temperature detecting element. Thus, the thermal resistance of the temperature detecting element with respect to the intake flow can be reduced; therefore, the intake temperature sensor 9 capable of precisely detecting the temperature of the intake at high speed even in the low air mass flow zone can be provided.
대표청구항: An intake temperature sensor comprising a temperature detecting element (6; 26; 38; 50) inserted in an opening provided in an intake pipe (3) to be disposed in the intake pipe (3), wherein the temperature detecting element (6; 26; 38; 50) is mechanically joined with a heat sink (4) directly exposed to an intake flow flowing in the intake pipe (3) and outputs the temperature of the intake based on an output obtained from the temperature detecting element (6; 26; 38; 50).
발명자/고안자: Matsumoto, Masahiro | Nakano, Hiroshi | Hanzawa, Keiji | Asano, Satoshi

발명의 명칭: Temperature sensor with improved resistance against vibration
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature avec r?sistance am?lior?e anti-vibration
요약: In a temperature sensor, a thermal sensitive element, a pair of electrodes, one end of each of wires, and one end portion of a lengthy sheath are covered with a tubular wall of a cover. An inner wall surface of the tubular wall of the cover and an edge surface of the one end portion of the sheath provide a first space therebetween. At least part of an outer surface of the one end portion of the sheath opposing the inner wall surface of the tubular wall of the cover is formed with a recess spaced at a given distance away from the edge surface. The inner wall surface of the tubular wall of the cover and the recess provide a second space therebetween. A first electric insulator is filled thoroughly within the first space, and a second electric insulator is filled within the second space.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor (100) comprising: a thermal sensitive element (5) having a pair of electrodes (102) coupled thereto;a sheathed wiring member (130) comprising: a pair of wires (103) each with one end; and a lengthy sheath (105) having one end portion (105b) and covering the pair of wires (103) such that the one end of each of the wires (103) overhangs from an edge surface (105a) of the one end portion (105b) of the lengthy sheath (105), the one end of each of the wires (103) being connected with a corresponding one of the electrodes (102); anda cover (104) having a tubular wall (104a, 104b, 104c) with a closed end (CE) and an open end (OE) opposite thereto, the one end portion (105b) of the lengthy sheath (105) being inserted in the cover (104) via the open end (OE) thereof, an inner wall surface of the tubular wall (104a, 104b, 104c) of the cover (104) and the edge surface (105a) of the one end portion (105b) of the lengthy sheath (105) providing a first space (IS1) therebetween, the thermal sensitive element (5), the pair of electrodes (102), and the one end of each of the wires (103) being stored in the first space (IS1) and covered with the tubular wall (104a, 104b, 104c),characterized in that at least part of an outer surface of the one end portion (105b) of the lengthy sheath (105) opposing the inner wall surface of the tubular wall (104a, 104b, 104c) of the cover (104) is formed with a recess (108), the recess (108) being spaced at a given distance away from the edge surface (105a) of the one end portion (105b) of the lengthy sheath (105), the inner wall surface of the tubular wall (104a, 104b, 104c) of the cover (104) and the recess (108) providing a second space (IS2) therebetween; and that the temperature sensor (100) further comprises a first electric insulator (107a) filled thoroughly within the first space (IS1); and a second electric insulator (107b) filled within the second space (IS2).
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature (100) comprenant : un ?l?ment sensible ? la chaleur (5) comportant une paire d'?lectrodes (102) qui lui sont coupl?es ;un organe de c?blage gain? 발명의 명칭: TEMPERATURE SENSOR AND TEMPERATURE SENSOR SYSTEM
발명의 명칭(제2언어): CAPTEUR DE TEMP?RATURE ET SYST?ME DE CAPTEUR DE TEMP?RATURE
요약: Provided is a temperature sensor capable of stably keeping the accuracy of detected temperatures. The temperature sensor of the present invention comprises a sensor element (1) comprising a temperature sensing element (2) whose electrical resistance changes according to temperature; a pair of lead wires (4) electrically connected to the temperature sensing element (2); and a covering material (5) which seals the temperature sensing element (2) and portions of the lead wires (4) in a prescribed range; wherein the lead wires (4) are led out of the sealed ends (6) of the covering material (5). The temperature sensor further comprises a metallic protective tube (20) which houses the sensor element (1) except part of the lead wires (4); and a shield comprising a ceramic sealed end closing element (7) which encloses the sealed ends (6), and a lead wire protective tube (8). The shield is loosely fitted inside the metallic protective tube (20).
요약(제2언어): La pr?sente invention concerne un capteur de temp?rature pouvant maintenir de fa?on stable la pr?cision des temp?ratures d?tect?es. Le capteur susmentionn? est ?quip? d'un ?l?ment de d?tection de la temp?rature (2) dont la r?sistance ?lectrique change en fonction de la temp?rature, de deux fils conducteurs (4) connect?s ?lectriquement ? l'?l?ment de d?tection de la temp?rature (2), et d'un mat?riau de recouvrement (5) qui scelle l'?l?ment de d?tection de la temp?rature (2) et les parties des fils conducteurs (4) qui se trouvent dans une plage sp?cifi?e. Le capteur susmentionn? est ?galement ?quip? d'un corps de recouvrement comprenant un ?l?ment d?tecteur (1) dans lequel les fils conducteurs (4) sortent des extr?mit?s scell?es (6) du mat?riau de recouvrement (5), d'un tube de protection m?tallique (20) qui accueille un ?l?ment d?tecteur (1) sauf pour une partie des fils conducteurs (4), d'un ?l?ment c?ramique fermant les extr?mit?s scell?es (7) qui renferme les extr?mit?s scell?es (6), et d'un tube de protection des fils conducteurs (8). Le corps de recouvrement est ajust? de fa?on l?che dans le tube de protection m?tallique (20).
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: a sensor element comprising a temperature sensing element whose electrical resistance changes according to temperature; a pair of lead wires electrically connected to the temperature sensing element: and a covering material which seals the temperature sensing element and the lead wires in a prescribed range from the connections; wherein the lead wires are led out of the sealed ends of the covering material;a metallic protective tube which houses the sensor element except part of the lead wires; anda shield made of ceramic comprising a sealed end closing section which is present between the temperature sensing element and the metallic protective tube and encloses the sealed ends, and a lead wire protective section having through holes in which the lead wires taken out of the sealed ends are housed in a piercing manner,wherein the shield is loosely fitted inside the metallic protective tube.

발명의 명칭: TEMPERATURE SENSOR, MANUFACTURING PROCESS AND CORRESPONDING METHOD OF ASSEMBLY
발명의 명칭(제2언어): CAPTEUR DE TEMPERATURE, PROCEDE DE FABRICATION ET PROCEDE D'ASSEMBLAGE CORRESPONDANT
요약: The invention relates to a temperature sensor comprising: a temperature-sensitive element (3); and a peripheral casing (7) accommodating the temperature-sensitive element (3) and having a closed end (9), the peripheral casing (7) being able to be inserted into a corresponding cavity (11), characterized in that the closed end (9) of the peripheral casing (7) has a peripheral portion (21) revealing, butted against the closed end, a flexible assembly stop (23) after said peripheral portion (21), said stop (23) being able to deform towards the peripheral portion (21) by shape cooperation with the bottom (15) of the corresponding cavity (11). The subject of the invention is also a process for manufacturing a temperature sensor as described above and a method of assembling said sensor.
요약(제2언어): L'invention concerne un capteur de temp?rature comprenant : un ?l?ment sensible ? la temp?rature (3); et une enveloppe p?riph?rique (7) recevant l'?l?ment sensible ? la temp?rature (3) ? une extr?mit? ferm?e (9), l'enveloppe p?riph?rique (7) ?tant apte ? s'ins?rer dans une cavit? correspondante (11), caract?ris? en ce que l'extr?mit? ferm?e (9) de l'enveloppe p?riph?rique (7) comporte une portion p?riph?rique (21) d?gageant en bout de l'extr?mit? ferm?e une but?e flexible d'assemblage (23) cons?cutivement ? ladite portion p?riph?rique (21), ladite but?e (23) ?tant susceptible de se d?former vers la portion p?riph?rique (21) par coop?ration de forme avec le fond (15) de la cavit? correspondante (11). L'invention a aussi pour objet un proc?d? de fabrication et un proc?d? d'assemblage d'un capteur de temp?rature tel que d?crit pr?c?demment.
발명자/고안자: LE BOUQUIN, Dominique | ROBIC, Jean-Pierre

발명의 명칭: Temperature sensor for a resistance thermometer, in particular for use in the exhaust section of combustion engines
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Sonde de temp?rature pour un thermom?tre ? r?sistance, en particulier destin? ? l'utilisation dans un syst?me d'?chappement de moteurs ? combustion
요약(제2언어): Beschrieben wird ein Temperaturf?hler f?r ein Widerstandsthermometer - mit einem elektrischen Messwiderstand, welcher als Widerstandsmaterial entweder einen keramischen Werkstoff oder ein metallisches Widerstandsmaterial in Verbindung mit einem keramischen oder mineralischen Tr?ger aufweist, - mit einem Schutzrohr, welches eine geschlossene Spitze und ein hinteres Ende mit einem Zugang zum Innenraum des Schutzrohrs hat und den Messwiderstand dicht bei der geschlossenen Spitze des Schutzrohres enth?lt, - mit mindestens einer aus dem hinteren Ende des Schutzrohres herausf?hrenden Zuleitung, und mit einem elektrisch isolierenden F?llstoff auf der Grundlage eines keramischen oder mineralischen Materials, welches den Raum zwischen dem Schutzrohr auf der einen Seite und dem Messwiderstand und seiner wenigstens einen Zuleitung auf der anderen Seite ausf?llt. Erfindungsgem?ß ist vorgesehen, dass die Packungsdichte des F?llstoffs in L?ngsrichtung des Schutzrohrs einen Gradienten hat.
대표청구항: Temperature sensor for a resistance thermometer comprising - an electric measuring resistor (3) the resistance material of which consists either of a ceramic material or of a metallic resistance material in combination with a ceramic or a mineral carrier,- a protective tube (2) comprising a closed tip (2b) and a rear end that provides an access to the inner space of the protective tube (2) and that contains the measuring resistor (3) closely adjacent the closed tip (2b) of the protective tube (2),- at least one supply line (5) that is brought out through the rear end of the protective tube (2), and an electrically insulating filler (6) based on a ceramic or a mineral material that fills the space between the protective tube (2) on the one side and the measuring resistor (3) and its at least one supply line (4, 5) on the other side, wherein the packing density of the filler (6) has a gradient in lengthwise direction of the protective tube (2),characterized in that the protective tube (2) exhibits a restriction (13) at the location of a maximum of the packing density of the filler (6).
대표청구항(제2언어): Sonde de temp?rature pour un thermom?tre ? r?sistance, - avec une r?sistance de mesure ?lectrique (3), comportant, en tant que mat?riau de r?sistance, soit un mat?riau c?ramique ou un mat?riau de r?sistance m?tallique, en association avec un substrat c?ramique ou min?ral,- avec un tube de protection (2) poss?dant une pointe ferm?e (2b) et une extr?mit? arri?re avec un acc?s ? l'espace int?rieur du tube de protection (2), et contenant la r?sistance de mesure (3) tout pr?s de la pointe ferm?e (2b) du tube de protection (2),- avec au moins une conduite d'arriv?e (5) sortant de l'extr?mit? arri?re du tube de protection (2),- et avec une mati?re de charge ?lectriquement isolante (6), ? base d'un mat?riau c?ramique ou min?ral, remplissant l'espace entre le tube de protection (2) d'un c?t? et la r?sistance de mesure (3) et son au moins une conduite d'arriv?e (4, 5) de l'autre c?t?, dans laquelle la densit? de tassement de la mati?re de charge (6) pr?sente un gradient dans le sens longitudinal du tube de protection (2),caract?ris?e en ce que le tube de protection (2) comporte un passage resserr? (13) ? l'endroit d'un maximum de la densit? de tassement de la mati?re de charge (6).

발명의 명칭: Temperature sensor for a resistance thermometer, in particular for use in the exhaust section of combustion engines
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Sonde de temp?rature pour un thermom?tre ? r?sistance, en particulier destin? ? l'utilisation dans un syst?me d'?chappement de moteurs ? combustion
요약(제2언어): Beschrieben wird ein Temperaturf?hler f?r ein Widerstandsthermometer mit einem elektrischen Messwiderstand, welcher als Widerstandsmaterial entweder einen keramischen Werkstoff oder ein metallisches Widerstandsmaterial in Verbindung mit einem keramischen oder mineralischen Tr?ger aufweist, mit einem Schutzrohr, welches eine geschlossene Spitze und ein hinteres Ende mit einem Zugang zum Innenraum des Schutzrohrs hat und den Messwiderstand enth?lt, mit mindestens einem aus dem hinteren Ende des Schutzrohres herausf?hrenden Anschlussdraht des Messwiderstands und mit einem elektrisch isolierenden F?llstoff auf der Grundlage eines keramischen oder mineralischen Materials, welches in dem Raum zwischen dem Schutzrohr auf der einen Seite und dem Messwiderstand auf der anderen Seite ausf?llt, Erfindungsgem?ß ist vorgesehen, dass sich der F?llstoff im wesentlichen ?ber die L?nge des Messwiderstandes erstreckt, dessen vom Tr?ger ausgehender wenigstens einen Anschlussdraht jedoch freil?sst, dass der wenigstens eine Anschlussdraht mit einem Innenleiter eines mineralisch oder keramisch isolierten Kabels mit Metallmantel ist, dass der Metallmantel des Kabels durch eine metallische H?lse mit dem hinteren Ende des Schutzrohres verbunden ist und dass in der H?lse eine Dehnungsausgleichseinrichtung f?r den wenigstens einen Anschlussdraht des Messwiderstands angeordnet ist.
대표청구항: Temperature sensor for a resistance thermometer - having an electric measuring resistor (3) the resistance material of which consists either of a ceramic material or of a metallic resistance material in combination with a ceramic or a mineral carrier (7);- having a protective tube (2) comprising a closed tip (2b) and a rear end that provides an access to the inner space of the protective tube (2) and that contains the measuring resistor (3);- having at least one connection wire (4) of the measuring resistor (3) that is brought out through the rear end of the protective tube (2);- and having an electrically insulating filler (6) based on a ceramic or a mineral material that fills space between the protective tube (2) on the one side and the measuring resistor (3) on the other side, wherein the at least one connection wire (4) is connected with an inner conductor (5) of a mineral-insulated or a ceramic-insulated metal-sheathed (9) cable (8);characterized in that the filler (6) extends substantially over the length of the measuring resistor (3), while leaving exposed the at least one connection wire (4) that extends from the carrier (7); that the metal sheath (9) of the cable (8) is connected with the rear end of the protective tube (2) by a metallic sleeve (10); and that an expansion compensating means (12) for the at least one connection wire (4) of the measuring resistor (3) is arranged in the sleeve (10).
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature pour un thermom?tre ? r?sistance, - avec une r?sistance ?lectrique de mesure (3) comportant, en tant que mat?riau de r?sistance, soit une mati?re c?ramique soit un mat?riau de r?sistance m?tallique en association avec un support c?ramique ou min?ral (7),- avec un tube de protection (2) poss?dant une pointe ferm?e (2b) et une extr?mit? arri?re avec un acc?s ? l'espace int?rieur du tube de protection (2) et contenant la r?sistance de mesure (3),- avec au moins un fil de connexion (4) de la r?sistance de mesure (3) sortant de l'extr?mit? arri?re du tube de protection (2), et- avec un agent de charge (6) ?lectriquement isolant, ? base d'un mat?riau c?ramique ou min?ral, remplissant l'espace entre le tube de protection (2) d'un c?t? et la r?sistance de mesure (3) de l'autre c?t?, dans lequel l'au moins un fil de connexion (4) est reli? au conducteur interne (5) d'un c?ble (8) reli? ? l'extr?mit? arri?re du tube de protection (2) par une douille m?tallique (10),caract?ris? en ce que l'agent de charge (6) s'?tend essentiellement sur la longueur de la r?sistance de mesure (3), mais tout en laissant libre l'au moins un fil de connexion (4) de celle-ci en partant du support (7),en ce que le c?ble (8) est isol?e de fa?on min?rale ou c?ramique et poss?de une enveloppe m?tallique (9),en ce que l'enveloppe m?tallique (9) du c?ble (8) est reli?e ? l'extr?mit? arri?re du tube de protection (2) par une douille m?tallique (10), et en ce qu'un dispositif de compensation d'extension (12) est install? dans la douille (10), pour l'au moins un fil de connexion (4) de la r?sistance de mesure (3).

요약: The invention relates to a temperature sensor (1) comprising a sensor element (4) and being in contact with a housing (2) configured as a contact wire of the temperature sensor (1). A contact wire (6, 7, 10, 11) arranged inside the housing (2), is configured concentrically and is held under spring tension with an annular spring (10). For testing purposes, a testing resistor (9) being connected parallel to the sensor element (4) is proposed.
요약(제2언어): L'invention concerne un capteur de temp?rature (1) qui pr?sente un ?l?ment capteur (4) qui se trouve en contact avec un bo?tier (2) du capteur de temp?rature (1), r?alis? comme un conducteur de contact. Un conducteur de contact (6, 7, 10, 11) dispos? ? l'int?rieur du bo?tier (2) est r?alis? concentriquement et est maintenu sous la tension d'un ressort ? l'aide d'un ressort annulaire (10). ? des fins de contr?le est pr?vue une r?sistance de contr?le (9) mont?e en parall?le par rapport ? l'?l?ment de capteur (4).
대표청구항: Temperature sensor for determining the temperature of exhaust gases from an internal combustion engine, having a temperature-sensitive sensor element (4) which is arranged in a housing (2), and having a contact line (6, 7, 10, 11, 12) which runs in the interior of the housing (2) and is connected to the sensor element (4), characterized in that the sensor element (4) is in contact with the housing (2) which is in the form of a further contact line, and a spring element (10) which is arranged in the interior of the housing (2) exerts a spring force, which acts in the axial direction, on the sensor element (4) and the contact line (6, 7, 11, 12) which runs in the interior of the housing (2).
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature permettant de d?terminer la temp?rature des gaz d'?chappement d'un moteur ? combustion interne, ledit capteur comportant un ?l?ment capteur (4) sensible ? la temp?rature mont? dans un bo?tier (2) et un conducteur de raccordement (6, 7, 10, 11, 12) raccord? ? l'?l?ment capteur (4) et log? ? l'int?rieur du bo?tier (2), caract?ris? par le fait que l'?l?ment capteur (4) est en contact avec le bo?tier (2) con?u comme autre conducteur de raccordement et qu'un anneau-ressort (10) dispos? ? l'int?rieur du bo?tier (2) exerce une force ?lastique dans le sens axial sur l'?l?ment capteur (4) et sur le conducteur de raccordement (6, 7, 11, 12) log? ? l'int?rieur du bo?tier (2).

요약: A protruding length L1 that is a distance between an inner circumference of a flow path through which fluid flows on an axis of a temperature sensor disposed in the flow path and the center of said temperature sensitive device is 50mm or more. A protruding location that is a distance between an inner circumferential surface of the flow path and the center of said temperature sensitive device on a cross section extending perpendicular to the axis of said flow path through the center of said temperature sensitive device is defined as L1'. A flow path width that is a distance between intersections of the axis of the temperature sensor with the inner circumferential surface of said flow path when the temperature sensor is projected onto said cross section is defined as D1. A relation of L1'/D1 is specified as a function of the value of D1, thereby reducing heat transfer in an exhaust temperature sensor and enabling the temperature to be measured accurately.
요약(제2언어): Sur une sonde thermom?trique pour gaz d'?chappement implant?e dans un canal d'?coulement fluidique, une longueur de d?passement (L1) correspondant ? la distance entre la circonf?rence interne du canal fluidique et le centre de l'?l?ment thermosensible de la sonde est r?gl?e ? 50 mm ou plus. Une position de d?passement (L1') est fix?e en tant que distance entre le circonf?rence interne du canal fluidique et le centre de l'?l?ment thermosensible selon une coupe verticale par rapport ? l'axe du canal fluidique. Une largeur de canal fluidique (D1) est fix?e en tant que distance entre les intersections de l'axe de la sonde thermom?trique et les surfaces de la circonf?rence interne du canal fluidique lorsque l'on projette la coupe de la sonde thermom?trique. La valeur L1'/D1 est d?finie en fonction de la largeur du canal fluidique (D1), ce qui permet de supprimer le rayonnement thermique de la sonde et donc d'obtenir des relev?s de temp?rature pr?cis.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor including a temperature sensitive device which is disposed in a flow path through which fluid flows and whose electric characteristic changes as a function of temperature of the fluid in the flow path, signal lines connected at top end sides thereof to said temperature sensitive device through electrode wires and at base end sides thereof to lead wires for connection with an external circuit, a sheath member retaining the signal lines therein, and a holding member which holds an outer circumferential surface of said sheath member directly or indirectly through another member, characterized in that a protruding length L1 that is a distance between an inner circumference of said flow path on an axis of the temperature sensor and a center of said temperature sensitive device is 50mm or more, and if a protruding location that is a distance between an inner circumferential surface of the flow path and a center of said temperature sensitive device on a cross section extending perpendicular to an axis of the flow path through the center of said temperature sensitive device is defined as L1', and a flow path width that is a distance between intersections of the axis of the temperature sensor with the inner circumferential surface of the flow path when the temperature sensor is projected onto said cross section is defined as D1, a relation below is met L?1??/D?1?0.6-1/1000×D?1when100?mm?D?1<200?mm,[Image] L?1??/D?1?0.74-1/600×D?1when200?mm?D?1<300?mm,[Image] or L?1??/D?1?0.24when300?mm?D?1.[Image]

요약: A temperature sensor including a temperature sensitive device which is disposed in a flow path through which fluid flows and whose electric characteristic changes as a function of temperature of the fluid in the flow path, signal lines connected at top end sides thereof to said temperature sensitive device through electrode wires and at base end sides thereof to lead wires for connection with an external circuit, a sheath member retaining the signal lines therein, and a holding member which holds an outer circumferential surface of said sheath member directly or indirectly through another member. The resonance (primary) frequency at a top end of the temperature sensor against acceleration in a radius direction of the temperature sensor is 480Hz or less, thereby reducing the transmission of vibration to the top end of the temperature sensor to avoid the breakage of the temperature sensitive device and the disconnection of the electrode wires 502102 even when the temperature sensor resonates.
요약(제2언어): Sonde thermom?trique constitu? comme suit: ?l?ment thermosensible dispos? dans un canal d'?coulement fluidique, dont la caract?ristique ?lectrique est modifi?e par la temp?rature du fluide dans le canal; ligne signal dont l'extr?mit? pointe est reli?e ? l'?l?ment thermosensible via une ligne d'?lectrode et dont l'extr?mit? base est reli?e ? une extr?mit? fil pour connexion ? un circuit externe; ?l?ment de gaine maintenant en lui la ligne signal; et ?l?ment de maintien maintenant la surface circonf?rentielle ext?rieur de l'?l?ment de gaine soit directement, soit indirectement via un autre ?l?ment. La fr?quence de r?sonance (primaire) ? l'extr?mit? pointe de la sonde thermom?trique est fix?e ? 480 Hz ou moins compte tenu de l'acc?l?ration dans le sens radial de ladite sonde de mani?re ? supprimer la transmission des vibrations ? l'extr?mit? pointe de la sonde. Ainsi, m?me si une r?sonance se produit dans la sonde thermom?trique, il est possible d'?viter efficacement la rupture de l'?l?ment thermosensible ou le d?branchement de la ligne d'?lectrode 502102.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor including a temperature sensitive device which is disposed in a flow path through which fluid flows and whose electric characteristic changes as a function of temperature of the fluid in the flow path, signal lines connected at top end sides thereof to said temperature sensitive device through electrode wires and at base end sides thereof to lead wires for connection with an external circuit, a sheath member retaining the signal lines therein, and a holding member which holds an outer circumferential surface of said sheath member directly or indirectly through another member, characterized in that a resonance (primary) frequency at a top end of the temperature sensor against acceleration in a radius direction of the temperature sensor is 480Hz or less.

요약: A temperature sensor including a housing and a temperature sensing element at least partially disposed in the housing. A particulate media, which may include a blend of differently sized particles, is disposed in the housing and at least partially surrounds the temperature sensing element. The particulate media may entrain oxygen to avoid a reducing atmosphere in said housing.

Une substance constitu?e de particules, qui peut comprendre un m?lange de particules de diff?rentes tailles, est plac?e dans le bo?tier et entoure au moins partiellement l'?l?ment de mesure de temp?rature. La substance constitu?e de particules peut attirer de l'oxyg?ne pour ?viter que l'atmosph?re ne soit r?ductrice dans ledit bo?tier.

발명의 명칭: Temperature sensor with improved resistance against vibration
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature avec r?sistance am?lior?e anti-vibration
요약: In a method of manufacturing a temperature sensor, a temperature sensing member is inserted into a cover from a thermal sensitive head via an open end thereof until an edge surface of one end portion of a lengthy sheath is in contact with a middle portion of an inner wall surface of a tubular wall of the cover in a longitudinal direction thereof so that a storage space is formed between the inner wall surface and the edge surface. The thermal sensitive head is stored in the storage space and covered with the tubular wall. The one end portion of the lengthy sheath is fixed to the inner wall surface of the tubular wall of the cover. The tubular wall of the cover is inwardly deformed to reduce a volume of the storage space, thus fully filling the insulator within the storage space.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: a thermal sensitive element having a pair of electrodes coupled thereto; a sheathed wiring member comprising: a pair of wires each with one end; and a lengthy sheath having one end portion and covering the pair of wires such that the one end of each of the wires overhangs from an edge surface of the one end portion of the lengthy sheath, the one end of each of the wires being connected with a corresponding one of the electrodes; a cover having a tubular wall with a closed end and an open end opposite thereto, the one end portion of the lengthy sheath being inserted in the cover via the open end thereof, an inner wall surface of the tubular wall of the cover and the edge surface of the one end portion of the lengthy sheath providing a storage space therebetween, the thermal sensitive element, the pair of electrodes, and the one end of each of the wires being stored in the storage space and covered with the tubular wall, at least part of an outer surface of the tubular wall being formed with an inward recess, the inward recess being located between the edge surface of the one end portion of the lengthy sheath and the electrodes; and an electric insulator filled thoroughly within the storage space.
발명자/고안자: Yoshida, Koichi

발명의 명칭: Temperature sensor and method of producing the temperature sensor
발명의 명칭(제2언어): D?tecteur de temp?rature et proc?d? de production du capteur de temp?rature
요약: In a temperature sensor having a temperature sensitive element, a sheath pin connected to the temperature sensitive element, and a cover case. The cover case, filled with a filler, accommodates the temperature sensitive element and the sheath pin. A hardening temperature of the filler is not less than an actual usage environment of the temperature sensor. Another temperature sensor has a temperature sensitive element exposed at a high temperature of not less than 750°C, a thermistor element, a sheath pin, an anti-vibration filler, and a metal cover case fixed to an end part of the sheath pin. The metal cover case accommodates the sheath pin and the thermistor element. The filler is made of a porous insulation material having a pore ratio within a range of 30 to 70 % and filled around the thermistor element in the metal cover case.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: a temperature sensitive element, whose electrical characteristic changes based on a temperature; a sheath pin accommodating the temperature sensitive element so that a pair of electrodes of the temperature sensitive element electrically connected to a pair of signal wires of the sheath pin is exposed at a front part of the sheath pin; a cover case placed at a front part of the temperature sensor accommodating the temperature sensitive element; and a filler, made of a material whose hardening temperature is not less than a temperature of an usage environment, filled between the temperature sensitive element and the cover case in order to fix the temperature sensitive element to the cover case.
발명자/고안자: Toudou, Yuusuke | Kuzuoka, Kaoru,

요약: A temperature sensor (10) includes a probe section (12) for insertion into a hot zone (14). The probe section (12) includes a thermistor (26), a first lengthy pin (28) terminating at the thermistor (26), and a second lengthy pin (30) also terminating at the thermistor. A housing section (20) is on one end of the probe section (12) and outside of the hot zone (14). The housing section (20) includes a first spring (34) which biases the first pin (28) into contact with the thermistor (26), a second spring (36) which biases the second pin (30) into contact with the thermistor (26), a first electrical contact engaged with the first spring (34), and a second electrical contact engaged with the second spring (36).
대표청구항: A temperature sensor (10) comprising: a probe section (12) for insertion into a hot zone (14), the probe section including: a thermistor (26), a first lengthy pin (28) terminating at the thermistor, and a second lengthy pin (30) also terminating at the thermistor; and a housing section (20) on one end of the probe section and outside of the hot zone, the housing section including: a first spring (34) which biases the first pin into contact with the thermistor, a second spring (36) which biases the second pin into contact with the thermistor, a first electrical contact engaged with the first spring, and a second electrical contact engaged with the second spring.
발명자/고안자: Geer, David

요약: A temperature sensor used to monitor coolant and an automobile coolant system. The temperature sensor includes a one-piece housing (12) having a sensor portion (14) and a connector portion (16). A sensor assembly, including a sensor (30) having a pair of terminals (46) connected thereto is disposed within the housing. The sensor portion includes a sensor tip (42) having a configuration conducive to improving thermal transfer from the coolant through the sensor tip to the sensor. A thermally conductive material may also be used to improve thermal or heat transfer to the sensor.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: a one-piece plastic housing, said housing having a sensor portion and a connector portion; a sensor element disposed in said the sensor portion of said housing; and a pair of terminals connected on one end thereof to said the sensor element and supported in said connector portion of said housing.
발명자/고안자: Gadonniex, Dennis M. | Wharton, Steven | Philbin, Jeffrey L.

발명의 명칭: AIR INTAKE DEVICE, SENSOR UNIT, TWO-WHEELED VEHICLE, AND INTAKE AIR TEMPERATURE DETECTION METHOD
발명의 명칭(제2언어): DISPOSITIF D'AMENEE D'AIR, UNITE DE CAPTEUR, VEHICULE A DEUX ROUES, ET METHODE DE DETECTION DE TEMPERATURE D'AIR D'AMENEE
요약: To mount an intake air temperature sensor and a pressure sensor on an air-intake device in compact manner. An intake air temperature sensor (22) is disposed on the upstream side of a throttle shaft (13) in a flow channel (11) of a throttle body (10). The intake air temperature sensor (22) is disposed in front of the throttle shaft (13) so as not to contact the throttle valve (12). An inlet of a pressure guiding path (15) that guides a pressure to a pressure sensor (23) is disposed on the downstream side of a first half part of the throttle valve (12), the first half part being revolved upstream when the throttle valve (13) is revolved in an opening direction. One of two screws that attaches the sensor unit (20) to the throttle body (10) is disposed on the upstream side of a half part. The other of the screws is disposed on the downstream side of the other half part. A detection value of intake air temperature is corrected into a detection value of intake air temperature in the vicinity of an air cleaner.
요약(제2언어): L'invention concerne un capteur de temp?rature d'air d'amen?e et un capteur de pression mont?s de mani?re compacte dans un dispositif d'amen?e d'air. Un capteur de temp?rature d'air d'amen?e (22) est mont? sur une trajectoire d'?coulement (11) d'un corps de papillon (10), plus du c?t? amont que du c?t? de l'arbre de papillon (13). En outre, le capteur de temp?rature d'air d'amen?e (22) est positionn? ? l'avant de l'arbre de papillon (13), ? une position dans laquelle le capteur de temp?rature (22) n'est pas en contact avec la soupape de papillon (12). L'entr?e d'une trajectoire d'introduction de pression (15) pour introduire de la pression dans un capteur de pression (23) est positionn?e du c?t? aval d'un premier demi-segment de la soupape de papillon (12) qui pivote vers le c?t? amont, lorsque la soupape de papillon (12) pivote dans la direction d'ouverture. Une des deux vis permettant de fixer l'unit? de capteur (20) sur le corps de papillon (10) est positionn?e du c?t? amont de la partie de demi-segment. L'autre vis est positionn?e du c?t? aval de l'autre partie de demi-segment. En outre, une valeur mesur?e d'une temp?rature d'air d'amen?e est corrig?e pour obtenir une valeur mesur?e d'une temp?rature d'air d'amen?e ? proximit? d'un ?purateur d'air.
대표청구항: An air-intake device using a butterfly-type throttle valve in which a sensor unit having an intake air temperature sensor and a pressure sensor is mounted on a throttle body, wherein the intake air temperature sensor is disposed at a position on an upstream side of a throttle shaft in a flow channel of the throttle body so as not to contact the throttle valve, an inlet in the flow channel of a pressure guiding path that guides a pressure to the pressure sensor is disposed on a downstream side of a first half part of the throttle valve, the first half part being revolved upstream when the throttle valve is revolved in an opening direction, and a first attaching unit that attaches the sensor unit to the throttle body is disposed on the upstream side of the first half part, and a second attaching unit that attaches the sensor unit to the throttle body is disposed on the downstream side of a second half part, the second half part being revolved downstream when the throttle valve is revolved in an opening direction.
발명자/고안자: Musashi, Kazuhiro | Miura, Osamu

발명의 명칭: Sintered body for thermistor devices, thermistor device and temperature sensor
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Corps fritt? pour thermistance, thermistance et sonde de temp?rature
요약: A sintered body (1) for thermistor devices comprising: at least one element selected from elements of group 3 in a periodic table proviso that La is excluded is Y,Sc,Ce,Nd,Sm,Eu,Gd,Dy,Er or Yb; at least one element selected from elements of group 2 in a periodic table is Ca,Sr,Mg or Ba; Mn; Al; and oxygen, and being substantially free from any transition metal other than Mn and the at least one element selected from elements of group 3 in the periodic table.
대표청구항: A sintered body for thermistor devices comprising: (i) at least one element selected from elements of group 3 in the periodic table with the proviso that La is excluded; (ii) at least one element selected from elements of group 2 in the periodic table; (iii) Mn; (iv) Al; and (v) oxygen, and being free from any transition metal other than (i) and (iii) above.
대표청구항(제2언어): Corps fritt? pour dispositifs de thermistance, comprenant : (i)au moins un ?l?ment s?lectionn? parmi les ?l?ments du groupe 3 dans le tableau p?riodique ? condition que le La soit exclu ; (ii) au moins un ?l?ment s?lectionn? parmi les ?l?ments du groupe 2 dans le tableau p?riodique ; (iii) du Mn ; (iv) de l'Al; et (v) de l'oxyg?ne, et ?tant d?pourvu de tout m?tal de transition autre que les composants (i) et (iii) ci-dessus.

요약: A temperature sensor comprising: a housing; a thermo-sensitive element housed in the housing for outputting electric characteristics varying with a temperature, as an electric signal; and a pair of lead wires connected at their one-side ends with the thermo-sensitive element for extracting the electric signal from the thermo-sensitive element to an outside of the housing, wherein at least one of the lead wires is made of a mixed twisted wire including: first electric wires made of a first conductor containing copper; and second electric wires made of a second conductor having a higher bending resistance and a tensile strength than those of the first conductor.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising:a housing;a thermo-sensitive element housed in the housing for outputting electric characteristics varying with a temperature, as an electric signal; anda pair of lead wires connected at their one-side ends with the thermo-sensitive element for extracting the electric signal from the thermo-sensitive element to an outside of the housing,    wherein at least one of the lead wires is made of a mixed twisted wire including: first electric wires made of a first conductor containing copper; and second electric wires made of a second conductor having a higher bending resistance and a tensile strength than those of the first conductor.
발명자/고안자: Hanzawa, Go | Nishi, Masahiko | Iwaya, Masaki | Chosokabe, Takaaki

발명의 명칭: EGR-gas temperature estimation apparatus for internal combustion engine
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Syst?me d'estimation de temp?rature des gaz d'?chappement recircul?s dans un moteur ? combustion interne
요약: An EGR-gas temperature estimation apparatus for an internal combustion engine which has an exhaust circulation pipe and an EGR-gas cooling apparatus. The estimation apparatus obtains the cooling efficiency ηegr of the EGR-gas cooling apparatus from the temperature Tex of EGR gas at the inlet of the exhaust circulation pipe and the flow rate Gegr of the EGR gas, and obtains the temperature THW of engine cooling water, used as a coolant for the EGR-gas cooling apparatus. Subsequently, the estimation apparatus calculates the temperature Tegr of the EGR gas at the outlet of the exhaust circulation pipe by the expression Tegr = Tex - ηegr·(Tex - THW). Since the cooling efficiency ηegr greatly changes depending on the EGR-gas flow rate Gegr and the EGR-gas temperature Tex, the estimation apparatus can accurately estimate the cooling efficiency ηegr, and therefore can accurately estimate the EGR-gas temperature Tegr.
대표청구항: An EGR-gas temperature estimation apparatus for an internal combustion engine which has an exhaust circulation pipe connected between an exhaust passage and an intake passage, an EGR control valve interposed in the exhaust circulation pipe and adapted to control flow rate of EGR gas flowing through the exhaust circulation pipe, and an EGR-gas cooling apparatus interposed in the exhaust circulation pipe, the EGR-gas temperature estimation apparatus comprising:means for obtaining a temperature of the EGR gas on an inlet side of the EGR-gas cooling apparatus;means for obtaining a corresponding value corresponding to the flow rate of the EGR gas flowing through the exhaust circulation pipe;cooling efficiency obtaining means for obtaining a cooling efficiency of the EGR-gas cooling apparatus on the basis of the EGR-gas temperature on the inlet side of the EGR-gas cooling apparatus and the obtained corresponding value; andoutlet EGR-gas temperature estimating means for estimating a temperature of the EGR gas on an outlet side of the EGR-gas cooling apparatus, on the basis of the EGR-gas temperature on the inlet side of the EGR-gas cooling apparatus and the obtained cooling efficiency.
출원인: TOYOTA JIDOSHA KABUSHIKI KAISHA | Denso Corporation
발명자/고안자: Matsunaga, Akio | Katsuno, Masato

발명의 명칭: Temperature sensor element and temperature sensor including the same
발명의 명칭(제2언어): El?ment capteur de temp?rature et capteur de temp?rature utilisant cet ?l?ment
요약: The present invention provides a temperature sensor element having excellent heat resistance, quick heat response, stable resistance, and high reliability with less variation in resistance against time. The temperature sensor element includes a thermo-sensitive film mainly composed of a heat sensitive material having electrical resistance varies depending on the temperature; a pair of electrode films arranged to measure the electrical resistance in the direction of the thickness of the thermo-sensitive film, a base plate mainly composed of a heat-resistant insulating material for supporting the thermo-sensitive film and the electrode films, an anti-diffusion film interposed between the thermo-sensitive film and the electrode film in the vicinity of the base plate, and a film mainly composed of a heat-resistant insulating material for covering the thermo-sensitive film and the electrode films except the lead-connecting terminals of the electrode films. The thermo-sensitive film is composed of an oxide of corundum crystalline structure represented by the formula of (Al1-x-y Crx Fey )2 O3 , where 0.05 x+y 0.95, and 0 y/(x+y) 0.6, and the anti-diffusion film is composed of an oxide of corundum crystalline structure represented by the formula of (Al1-x-y Crx Fey )2 O3 , where 0 x+y 0.95.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor element (131) comprising:a thermo-sensitive film (133) mainly composed of a heat sensitive material having electrical resistance which varies depending on the temperature;a pair of electrode films (134a, 134b), each having a lead-connecting terminal and an end portion remote from said lead-connecting terminal, said end portions of said electrode films being arranged on opposite faces of said thermo-sensitive film (133);a base plate (132) composed of a heat-resistant insulating material which supports said thermo-sensitive film (133) and said pair of electrode films (134a, 134b); anda film (135) mainly composed of a heat-resistant insulating material which covers said thermo-sensitive film (133) and said pair of electrode films (134a, 134b) except the lead-connecting terminals of said electrode films;    characterized in that:said base plate (132) is mainly composed of said heat-resistant insulating material;said end portions of said pair of electrode films (134a, 134b) are opposite each other through said thermo-sensitive film (133);said temperature sensor element (131) further comprises an anti-diffusion film (137) arranged between said thermo-sensitive film (133) and the one of said electrode films (134a) which is nearer to said base plate (132); andsaid anti-diffusion film (137) is composed of an oxide of corundum crystalline structure represented by the formula (Al1-x-y Crx Fey )2 O3 where 0 x+y 0.95.
대표청구항(제2언어): El?ment capteur de temp?rature (131) comprenant : un film thermosensible (133) compos? principalement d'un mat?riau sensible ? la chaleur ayant une r?sistance ?lectrique qui varie en fonction de la temp?rature ;une paire de films d'?lectrode (134a, 134b), ayant chacun une borne de connexion au conducteur et une partie d'extr?mit? distante de ladite borne de connexion au conducteur, lesdites parties d'extr?mit? desdits films d'?lectrode ?tant dispos?es sur les faces oppos?es dudit film thermosensible (133) ;une plaque de base (132) compos?e d'un mat?riau isolant r?sistant ? la chaleur qui supporte ledit film thermosensible (133) et ladite paire de films d'?lectrode (134a, 134b) ;etun film (135) compos? principalement d'un mat?riau isolant r?sistant ? la chaleur qui recouvre ledit film thermosensible (133) et ladite paire de films d'?lectrode (134a, 134b), sauf les bornes de connexion au conducteur desdits films d'?lectrode ; caract?ris? en ce que : ladite plaque de base (132) est principalement compos?e dudit mat?riau isolant r?sistant ? la chaleur ;lesdites parties d'extr?mit? de ladite paire de films d'?lectrode (134a, 134b) sont oppos?es l'une ? l'autre ? travers ledit film thermosensible (133) ;ledit ?l?ment capteur de temp?rature (131) comprend, en outre, un film anti-diffusion (137) dispos? entre ledit film thermosensible (133) et l'un desdits films d'?lectrode (134a) qui est le plus pr?s de ladite plaque de base (132) ; etledit film anti-diffusion (137) est compos? d'un oxyde d'une structure cristalline de corundum repr?sent?e par la formule (Al1-x-y Crx Fey )2 O3 o? 0 x+y 0,95.

요약: Temperature sensor, especially for gas sensor; has conductor path arranged between two insulation layers near heating unit and having section made of solid electrolyte The sensor has at least one conductor path arranged between two insulation layers in the area of a heating unit (14) of the gas sensor, and measures the temperature-dependent variations of a resistance of the conductor path. The conductor path has at least one section consisting of a solid electrolyte. Part of the conductor path (16) of the heating unit also acts as part of the conductor path of the sensor.
요약(제2언어): Die Erfindung betrifft einen Temperaturf?hler, insbesondere f?r einen Gassensor, mit wenigstens einer Leiterbahn, wobei eine temperaturabh?ngige ?nderung eines Widerstands der Leiterbahn erfaßt und ausgewertet wird. Es ist vorgesehen, daß die Leiterbahn (42) wenigstens einen Abschnitt (44) aufweist, der aus einem Festelektrolyt besteht.
대표청구항(제2언어): Temperaturf?hler, insbesondere f?r einen Gassensor, mit wenigstens einer Leiterbahn, wobei eine temperaturabh?ngige ?nderung eines Widerstands der Leiterbahn erfaßt und ausgewertet wird, dadurch gekennzeichnet, daß die Leiterbahn (42) wenigstens einen Abschnitt (44) aufweist, der aus einem Festelektrolyt besteht.

발명의 명칭: TEMPERATURE SENSOR AND METHOD OF MANUFACTURING
발명의 명칭(제2언어): CAPTEUR DE TEMPERATURE ET PROCEDE DE FABRICATION
요약: A low-cost high-performance temperature sensor that can be manufactured of a thin-film temperature detecting element with high yield. The temperature sensor comprises a metal cylinder (1); a ceramic substrate (2) placed in the metal cylinder and including a temperature detecting element (3) and film electrodes (4) connected electrically with the output of the temperature detecting element (3); an inorganic filler (5) for absorbing stress to hold the ceramic substrate (2) inside the metal cylinder (1); and a cap (6), provided on one end of the metal cylinder (1), for protecting the temperature detecting element (3) on the ceramic substrate (2).
요약(제2언어): Cette invention se rapporte ? un capteur de temp?rature hautes performances peu co?teux, qui peut ?tre fabriqu? ? base d'un ?l?ment de d?tection thermique ? film mince avec un rendement ?lev?. Ce capteur de temp?rature comprend: un cylindre m?tallique (1), un substrat en c?ramique (2) plac? dans le cylindre m?tallique et contenant un ?l?ment de d?tection thermique (3) et des ?lectrodes en film (4) connect?es par voie ?lectrique ? la sortie de l'?l?ment de d?tection thermique (3); une charge inorganique (5) servant ? absorber les contraintes afin de maintenir le substrat en c?ramique (2) dans le cylindre m?tallique (1), et un couvercle (6) plac? ? l'une des extr?mit?s du cylindre m?tallique (1) et servant ? prot?ger l'?l?ment de d?tection thermique (3) sur le substrat en c?ramique (2).
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising: (a) a metal cylinder;(b) a ceramic substrate inserted into said metal cylinder, and provided with a temperature detecting element in a form of film and an electrode in a form of film for electrically tapping off an output of said temperature detecting element;(c) a supporting means having a function of reducing stress, for supporting said ceramic substrate in said metal cylinder; and(d) a protective cap placed on an end of said metal cylinder for protecting said temperature detecting element provided on said ceramic substrate.
