발명의 명칭: A temperature sensor and its manufacturing method
발명의 명칭(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature et proc?d? pour sa fabrication
요약: This invention relates to a temperature sensor determining the temperature of catalyst provided to process automobile exhaust gas, and a manufacturing method thereof. Said temperature sensor consists of a heat resistant cap, and a thermistor element having a very little long-term resistivity change disposed within said heat-resistant cap, and lead-wires connected to said thermistor elements to connect said thermistor element to an external circuit. The major materials constituting said thermistor are expressed by a below-shown chemical formula and composition, and this is combined with a minor material of CaO, rare-earth oxide, ThO , or ZrO , or a combination of these. The thermistor is manufactured through the processes of mixing, calcination,pulverization, granulation, and sintering. (Al1-x-yCrxFey) O 0.05 <= x + y <= 0.95, and 0.05 <= y/(x + y) <= 0.6
대표청구항: A temperature sensor comprising a thermistor disposed in a heat-resistant cap and lead wires electrically connected to said thermistor in order to connect said thermistor to an external circuit, wherein said thermistor is constituted of a material having the chemical composition (Al1-x-yCrxFey)2O3, wherein 0.05 ≤ x+y ≤ 0.95, 0.05 ≤ y/(x+y) ≤ 0.6.
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature comprenant ???une thermistance dispos?e dans un bo?tier r?sistant ? la chaleur et des fils de connexion reli?s ?lectriquement ? ladite thermistance afin de connecter ladite thermistance ? un circuit ext?rieur, dans lequel ladite thermistance est constitu?e d'un mat?riau ayant la composition chimique ???(Al1-x-yCrxFey)2O3, dans laquelle ???0,05 ≤ x+y ≤ 0,95 ???0,05 ≤ y/(x+y) ≤ 0,6.

발명의 명칭: ELECTROMAGNETIC INDUCTION HEATER AND OPERATION METHOD THEREFOR
발명의 명칭(제2언어): DISPOSITIF DE CHAUFFAGE PAR INDUCTION ELECTROMAGNETIQUE ET SON FONCTIONNEMENT
요약: An electromagnetic induction heater which is provided with a silicon nitride pipe (6 or 41) of a non-magnetic material through which a liquid flows in and out, a coil (7) wound around the silicon nitride pipe (6 or 41), and a heating body (8) accommodated in the silicon nitride pipe (6 or 41) and heated by electromagnetic induction by the coil (7), and which has flange members (2, 3) so formed at both ends of the silicon nitride pipe (6 or 41) as to engage with the end portions of the silicon nitride pipe (6 or 41) and to protrude outward in a radial direction, metal pipes (101, 102) having flanges (103, 104) and connected to both ends of the silicon nitride pipe (6 or 41), and fastening members (9, 10) for fastening the flange members (2, 3) at both ends of the silicon nitride pipe (6 or 41) to the flanges (103, 104) of the metal pipes (101, 102), respectively. The operation method comprises bringing the inside of the pipe into the immersed state by a fluid before the fluid is passed through the pipe, preheating the heating body (8) inside the pipe by electromagnetic induction, and allowing the fluid to flow.
요약(제2언어): L'invention concerne un dispositif de chauffage par induction electromagnetique pourvu d'une conduite (6 ou 41) en un materiau non magnetique tel que le nitrure de silicium. Un liquide entre et sort de cette conduite. Un enroulement (7) entoure la conduite en nitrure de silicium (6 ou 41) et un corps chauffant (8) est loge dans cette conduite pour etre chauffe par induction electromagnetique, grace a l'enroulement (7). Des brides (2, 3) saillant radialement sont formees aux deux extremites de la conduite en nitrure de silicium (6 ou 41) et elles s'engagent avec les portions terminales de cette conduite. Des conduites metalliques (101, 102) ayant des brides (103, 104) viennent contre les deux extremites de la conduite en nitrure de silicium (6 ou 41). Des elements de fixation (9, 10) permettent de fixer les brides (2, 3) s'engageant avec les deux extremites de la conduite en nitrure de silicium (6 ou 41), aux brides (103, 104) de conduites metalliques respectives (101, 102). Le procede d'utilisation du dispositif consiste a remplir l'interieur de la conduite avec un fluide avant de faire circuler celui-ci, a prechauffer le corps chauffant a l'interieur de la conduite par induction electromagnetique et ensuite a faire circuler le fluide.
대표청구항: An electromagnetic induction heater comprising a pipe (6 or 41) made of a non-magnetic material through which a fluid flows in and out; a coil (7) wound around said pipe (6 or 41); and a heating element (8) accommodated in said pipe (6 or 41) to be heated by means of electromagnetic induction caused by said coil (7), said pipe (6 or 41) being a molded form of silicon nitride.

요약: An oxide composition including (Al1-x-yCrxFey)2O3 and prescribed amounts of Mn or Mg, is provided. A temperature sensor including a heat-resistant cap, a thermistor element accommodated in the heat-resistant cap, and a pair of lead wires electrically connected to each other via the thermistor element and extending outside the heat-resistant cap is also provided, the thermistor element including the above-mentioned oxide composition.

발명의 명칭: TEMPERATURE SENSOR ELEMENT, TEMPERATURE SENSOR HAVING THE SAME AND METHOD FOR PRODUCING THE SAME TEMPERATURE SENSOR ELEMENT
발명의 명칭(제2언어): ELEMENT DE CAPTEUR DE TEMPERATURE, CAPTEUR DE TEMPERATURE COMPORTANT CET ELEMENT ET PROCEDE DE FABRICATION DUDIT ELEMENT DE CAPTEUR DE TEMPERATURE
요약: A temperature sensor element for measuring the temperature of exhaust gas from car engines comprises a metallic support having a shape of a flat board, a first electric-insulating film existing on the support, a first temperature sensitive film existing on the first electric-insulating film and having a pair of electrodes, and a second electric-insulating film existing on the temperature sensitive film. The element is superior in thermal shock resistance. The element needs no heat-resistant cap. The element is superior in heat-response since the element has a small heat capacity.
요약(제2언어): Cette invention concerne un ?l?ment de capteur de temp?rature destin? ? mesurer la temp?rature des gaz d'?chappement d'un moteur d'automobile, lequel ?l?ment comprend un corps de support m?tallique plat et en forme de plaque. Un premier film d'isolation ?lectrique recouvre l'?l?ment de support tandis qu'un film thermosensible poss?dant deux ?lectrodes recouvre le film d'isolation ?lectrique. Le film thermosensible est ? son tour recouvert d'un second film d'isolation ?lectrique. L'?l?ment de capteur de temp?rature poss?de une r?sistance sup?rieure aux chocs thermiques ainsi qu'une excellente r?ponse thermique ?tant donn? qu'aucune capsule r?sistante ? la chaleur n'est requise, sa capacit? thermique ?tant, quant ? elle, faible.
대표청구항: A temperature sensor element comprising a metallic support having a shape of a flat board,a first electric-insulating film provided on the support,a first temperature sensitive film provided on the first electric-insulating film and having a pair of electrodes, anda second electric-insulating film provided on the temperature sensitive film.

발명의 명칭: PTC TEMPERATURE SENSORS, PROCESS FOR PRODUCING PTC TEMPERATURE-SENSING ELEMENTS FOR PTC TEMPERATURE SENSORS
발명의 명칭(제2언어): CAPTEUR DE TEMPERATURE A COEFFICIENT POSITION DE TEMPERATURE (PTC) ET PROCEDE DE FABRICATION D'ELEMENTS DE DETECTION DE TEMPERATURE PTC POUR CE CAPTEUR
요약: A positive temperature coefficient (PTC) temperature sensor and a process for producing PTC temperature-sensing elements made of ceramic foils for PTC temperature sensors are disclosed. The temperature-sensing elements are designed in such a way that the PTC resistive strip are hermetically sealed from the measurement gas and the ambient atmosphere. In order to produce the temperature-sensing elements, ceramic foils on the basis of insulating ceramic materials, in particular Al2O3, and ceramic foils on the basis of solid electrolytes, may be used. The disclosed PTC temperature sensor is in particular characterized by the fact that it is not subject to ageing under the influence of changing O2 partial pressures, although it is cheap to produce, and that its resistance characteristics in rich and poor gas mixtures, for example in motor vehicle exhaust fumes between 300 and 10000C, are little affected by ageing. It is insensitive to extraneous voltages, has short reaction times due to its minimal heat capacity and can be fitted in very narrow housings thanks to its reduced size.
요약(제2언어): Capteur de temperature PTC et procede de fabrication d'elements de detection de temperature PTC en feuilles de ceramique pour ce capteur. Les elements de detection de temperature PTC sont disposes de telle maniaere que le circuit de resistance PTC est maintenu hermetiquement separe du gaz mesure et de l'air ambiant. Pour la fabrication des elements de detection de la temperature, on peut employer des feuilles de ceramique a base de ceramique isolante, en particulier Al2O3, et des feuilles de ceramique a base d'un electrolyte solide. Le capteur de temperature PTC objet de l'invention se distingue en particulier par le fait que, pour un mode de fabrication economique, il n'est pas sujet au vieillissement sous l'influence des variations de pression partielle de O2, qu'il presente une resistance elevee a l'alteration des caracteristiques de resistance dans les melanges gazeux gras ou maigres, par exemple dans les gaz d'echappement des vehicules a moteur entre 300 et 10000C, et qu'il est construit de maniaere a etre insensible aux potentiels parasites, qu'il se caracterise par des temps de reponse courts en raison de sa faible capacite thermique et qu'il peut etre monte dans des boitiers traes etroits en raison de ses faibles dimensions.
대표청구항: PTC temperature sensor, in particular for use in the exhaust gas system of internal combustion engines, having a sensing element with a PTC resistor disposed in a housing, characterised in that the PTC resistor and the conductor tracks are uniformly composed of one material and jointly form the resistor track (6), and in that the temperature sensing element is formed from ceramic films (1, 2) which are laminated together and sintered together in order to form a laminate composite in which the PTC resistor with conductor tracks (6) is hermetically encapsulated with respect to the gas being measured and the ambient air.
대표청구항(제2언어): Capteur de temp?rature PTC, utilisable notamment dans les ?chappements de moteurs ? combustion interne et comportant, ? l'int?rieur d'un bo?tier, un ?l?ment thermosensible ?quip? d'une r?sistance PTC, capteur caract?ris? en ce que cette r?sistance PTC et ses pistes conductrices sont constitu?es d'un m?me mat?riau et forment en m?me temps la r?sistante (6), et en ce que l'?l?ment thermosensible est constitu? de feuilles c?ramiques (1, 2) r?unies par laminage et frittage de mani?re ? former un ensemble lamin? ? l'int?rieur duquel la r?sistance PTC avec ses pistes conductrices (6) est encapsul?e de mani?re herm?tique par rapport aux gaz ? mesurer ainsi que par rapport ? l'air environnant.

발명의 명칭: NTC TEMPERATURE-SENSING DEVICE AND PROCESS FOR PRODUCING NTC TEMPERATURE-SENSING ELEMENTS
발명의 명칭(제2언어): DETECTEUR DE TEMPERATURE NTC ET PROCEDE DE FABRICATION D'ELEMENTS DE DETECTION DE TEMPERATURE NTC
요약: NTC temperature-sensing device and process for producing NTC temperature-sensing elements for NTC temperature-sensing devices made of ceramic foil. Said elements are designed to allow the ambient air or oxygen, added by electrolytic pumping, free access to the NTC resistor over a laminate compound canal that can be filled with porous material, while the NTC resistor itself is hermetically insulated from the measuirng gas. The device can be made from solid electrolyte foil conducting O2- ions and foils based on Al2O3. Particular features of these NTC temperature-sensing elements are: a characteristic curve of the NTC resistor which does not vary with the composition of the measuring gas; their durability, quick response, simple production technique and small dimensions (which make them particularly suited for mounting in very narrow casings), as well as the electrically insulated leads, which make the device free from external voltage.
요약(제2언어): Detecteur de temperature NTC et procede de fabrication d'elements de detection de temperature NTC en feuille de ceramique. Ces elements sont concus de maniaere a ce que l'air ambiant ou l'oxygaene amene par pompage electrolytique ait libre accaes, le cas echeant par un canal en compose lamine rempli de materiel poreux, a la resistance NTC, qui sera par contre hermetiquement isolee du gaz de mesure. Ces elements peuvent etre fabriques en feuilles d'electrolyte sec conductrices d'ions de O2- et en feuilles a base de Al2O3. Ces elements de detection de temperature NTC ont pour avantages le fait que la courbe caracteristique de la resistance NTC ne varie pas en fonction de la composition du gaz de mesure, leur durabilite, leur vitesse de reaction, la simplicite de leur mode de fabrication et leurs dimensions reduites (qui permettent en particulier de les inserer dans des boitiers traes etroits), et enfin leurs conducteurs electriquement isoles qui les rendent insensibles aux potentiels exterieurs.
대표청구항: NTC temperature sensor for a gas being measured, in particular for use in the exhaust gas system of internal combustion engines, containing a sensing element arranged in a housing with an NTC resistor and-conductor tracks which connect the NTC resistor to electrical contact areas, characterised in that the sensing element of the NTC temperature sensor is formed from a laminated composite of ceramic films in a manner such that the ambient air or oxygen supplied electrolytically by pumping has free access, via a channel (8) optionally filled with a porous material, to the NTC resistor (14, 17), but the latter is itself hermetically sealed with respect to the gas being measured by the laminated composite (Figure 1A: 1, 2, 3; Figure 2A: 11, 12, 13, Figure 3: 10, 15, 16; Figure 5B, Figure 6: 1, 2, 3; Figure 7: 1, 2) and by the housing.
대표청구항(제2언어): D?tecteur de temp?rature NTC pour mesurer un gaz pour une application notamment dans la tubulure des gaz d'?chappement de moteurs ? combustion interne, comportant un ?l?ment de d?tecteur plac? dans un bo?tier et ayant une r?sistance NTC ainsi que des chemins conducteurs reliant la r?sistance NTC ? des surfaces de contacts ?lectriques, d?tecteur caract?ris? en ce que l'?l?ment du d?tecteur de temp?rature NTC est form? d'un compos? stratifi? de feuilles en c?ramique de mani?re que l'air ambiant ou l'oxyg?ne pomp? de mani?re ?lectrolytique acc?de librement ? la r?sistance NTC (14, 17) par un canal (8), le cas ?ch?ant rempli d'une mati?re poreuse, cette r?sistance ?tant n?anmoins enferm?e, de mani?re herm?tique par rapport au gaz de mesure, par la liaison stratifi?e (figure 1A: 1, 2, 3 ; figure 2A : 11, 12, 13 ; figure 3 : 10, 15, 16 ; figure 5B, figure 6 : 1, 2, 3 ; figure 7 : 1, 2) ainsi que par le bo?tier.
